You can hear the insects next to you crawling around and making all sorts of noise. You just sit down against a wall of the jar holding your knees to your chest. Hopefully you'll be out of here soon. The longer you stay here the more you think it will drive you crazy. After what seems like an eternity, you hear the door open to Sato's office and climb to your feet. Light floods the closet and you readjust to the brightness, seeing who's entered the room...

12112131321.content: "MISS ME?" You hear as you get back up to the wall of the glass container. You pound on the wall and say "Professor Sato, let me out of here! I can't stand being in this closet anymore!" She laughs and says "WHAT'S WRONG? FEELING A LITTLE INSECURE SURROUNDED BY BUGS THAT COULD EAT YOU IF YOU WEREN'T LOCKED UP IN THAT JAR?" She's loving teasing you but you drop to your knees and clench your fists together almost as if you were asking god for forgiveness... which in a sense, you actually were. "Please! I'm sorry, professor! Just change me back! I'll do anything you want!" You see her cock an eyebrow as she says "ANYTHING? THAT'S A PRETTY STRONG STATEMENT. DO YOU REALLY MEAN IT?" You continue your resolve, hoping it will somehow get her to see reason in this situation. "Yes, i mean it. I'll do whatever you want me to as long as you get me out of this closet." The professor traces the outside of your jar with a massive fingertip and says "WELL, I'M NOT GOING TO CHANGE YOU BACK TO NORMAL JUST YET. YOU'RE STILL GOING TO HAVE TO BE PUNISHED FOR HAVING THOSE NASTY THOUGHTS ABOUT ME." She lets out a small hum as if she were thinking it over and says "BUT I THINK YOU CAN AT LEAST COME OUT FROM THE CLOSET. AFTER ALL, IT WOULD REALLY BE A WASTE OF A GOOD EXPERIMENT TO JUST LUMP YOU IN HERE WITH THE REST OF THE INSECTS." She scrapes her long fingernail against the glass in front of you. It doesn't make a screeching sound or anything like you were expecting it to, but just the small scraping sound it makes is unnerving enought. Sato tilts her head and says "SO I GUESS I'LL HAVE TO TAKE YOU HOME WITH ME. WE CAN DO A LOT MORE EXPERIMENTS AT MY APARTMENT WITHOUT THE SCHOOL BOARD BREATHING DOWN MY NECK." She gets up close to the jar and blows onto the glass, causing some condensation to form. She quickly wipes away a small line of it, and you are transfixed on the small clear window as all you can see is the humongous eye staring back at you. "I GUESS YOU'LL GET WHAT YOU WANTED... YOU'LL GET TO PEEK AT MY BODY AS MUCH AS YOU WANT. BUT IT WON'T BE FREE. I PLAN ON GETTING A LOT OF USE OUT OF YOU AT THAT SIZE." A loud giggle shakes you to the core as you try to comprehend what she means by that. Before you can put much thought into it, however, Sato's huge hand wraps back up around the glass and lifts you into the air. The skin of her palm and fingers are covering almost the complete outside wall, leaving you nothing to look at but what's above the lid. She peers into it and sighs as she says "THE ONLY THING TO DECIDE NOW IS HOW I'LL TAKE YOU HOME WITH ME. I CAN'T JUST HOLD YOU ALL THE WAY HOME, THAT WOULD BE SILLY." She thinks for a minute and then the realization hits her as she puts on another evil smirk and says "I'VE GOT IT! YOU CAN TRAVEL...."

121121313211.content: Her face leans in close to the jar as her breath fogs up the glass. "YOU'LL FIT IN MY BAG, I DIDN'T BRING A LOT OF THINGS. I WON'T EVEN HAVE TO TAKE YOU OUT OF THE JAR. WHICH IS GOOD, BECAUSE THERE'S ALL SORTS OF LOOSE CHANGE AND RANDOM THINGS FLOATING AROUND IN MY BAG. AT THAT SIZE, YOU'RE LIKELY TO BE CRUSHED BY ANY SORT OF COMMON THING. IMAGINE HAVING YOUR WHOLE BODY SMUSHED INTO PASTE IN MY BAG BECAUSE A MAKEUP MIRROR FELL ON TOP OF YOU." You shudder to think of that as a possibility but she just smirks defiantly and says "ACTUALLY, YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE PROTECTED. BUT I'M LETTING YOU. YOU SHOULD BE THANKING ME FOR BEING SO KIND. SO GO AHEAD... SAY THANK YOU." You are so thrown off by the whole situation that you don't react. You just stare at the giant professor's pretty but focused eyes and say "Please, Professor... just change me back... I'm sorry." The giant eyes roll off to the side, and the professor reaches down, grabbing the size ray, pointing the nozzle directly at the glass you're in. "SAY THANK YOU RIGHT NOW. OR I'LL TURN YOU INTO A DUST MITE AND DROP YOU IN THE CARPET." You don't need to be told twice, and drop to your knees, saying "Th...Thank you! Thank you for being.... so nice to me... I don't deserve it..." She puts the gun down and smirks saying "NO. NO YOU DON'T. BUT YOU'RE LEARNING. AND IT'S A START. SEE YOU AT HOME." The giant fingers surrounding the jar loosen their grip and you find yourself free falling within the jar. The container hits the bottom of her bag with a gigantic thud, knocking you from glass wall to glass wall, until you hit your head on one of them. The impact knocks you out cold, leaving you in a peaceful, uneventful sleep. You slowly come to, watching as light once again enters your sight. "GET UP..." Is all you hear around you, as you climb to your feet. You hold your head in pain, not seeing any blood on it, but feeling a bit of a bruise on your forehead. You slowly remember that you're just a few inches tall in Professor Sato's care, trapped in a jar like a common bug. You turn to notice a few things that were not in the jar to begin with. One of which was a wad of cotton, slightly bigger than your whole body. Another was a small box filled with water. And on the far end was a regular cardboard box, shrunken down to about half your size. You look around the jar puzzled, as vibrations pulsate through the glass. You can feel it in your feet and legs as the professor gets closer. You look down to acknowledge the sensation, when you realize that all of your clothes have been taken from you. You're completely naked! The rumblings get closer and closer as the once petit Asian woman makes her way into the room you're currently in. You figure you must be on a desk of some sort since even at your tiny size, you come up to the professor's waist. She takes a seat in a chair directly in front of you, and traces her finger down the side of the jar, looking down at you with a false expression of concern. "HOW ARE YOU FEELING? YOU TOOK A NASTY FALL IN MY BAG. SHOULD HAVE BRACED YOURSELF." You shout up at her "What happened to my clothes?" She just makes a "tsk tsk" sound and says "SILLY LITTLE MAN. PETS DON'T HAVE ANY CLOTHES." Your face goes cold as you say "Wh.. what do you mean, "PET"?" She takes off her glasses and bites the end, as if she was trying to find the words to explain this as clearly as possible. "YOU WERE NOT THE BEST MAN. PERVING ON YOUR TEACHER, TREATING ME LIKE A PIECE OF MEAT. I THINK IF YOU SPEND A FEW DAYS REMOVED FROM SOCIETY, RELYING COMPLETELY ON ME, YOU'LL BE MUCH BETTER OFF FOR IT." She points down at the items in the jar and you turn around to look at them again as she narrates. "YOU HAVE THE LITTLE COTTON BED THERE FOR SLEEPING, THE TROUGH WHICH I WILL CONSTANTLY FILL WITH CLEAN WATER, AND IF YOU NEED TO RELIEVE YOURSELF, THERE'S A BOX THERE FOR YOU. I'LL GIVE YOU SCRAPS FROM MY MEALS AND EVEN A FEW SNACKS IF YOU BEHAVE YOURSELF." You can't believe what Sato is doing to you. Just a few hours ago, you were a normal college student with a loving family, a girlfriend, and a bright future. Now you're nothing but a pet to the cutest teacher in the school. And what makes it even harder to believe is that Sato was always so sweet. You finally muster up the courage to ask her "H... How long will i have to stay like this?" She puts a finger to her chin in mock thought and says "WELL, THAT REALLY DEPENDS ON HOW WELL YOU ADAPT TO YOUR NEW LIFE. A WEEK... A MONTH... A YEAR... I CAN KEEP YOU TINY LIKE THAT AS LONG AS I WANT. IT DOESN'T TAKE A LOT TO TAKE CARE OF A MISERABLE BUG LIKE YOU. AND YOU'LL STAY THAT INSIGNIFICANT UNTIL YOU LEARN TO RESPECT ME." She stands up to her full height and reaches down, grabbing the jar with both hands. She walks around the room with you looking right at her huge face, as she continues to explain what your life has become. "I PROMISE NOT TO HURT YOU UNLESS YOU ACT OUT OF LINE, AND I WILL REWARD YOU IF YOU ARE GOOD. AND BESIDES...I KNOW YOU STILL THINK I'M SEXY, EVEN WITH ALL THESE... COMPLICATIONS. AND THAT'S WHAT I'LL TRY TO RECTIFY. YOU STILL SEE ME AS A SEX OBJECT, SO I'M GOING TO GIVE YOU ALL THE IMAGERY YOU'LL EVER NEED UNTIL YOU BECOME DESENSITIZED TO IT." She kisses the jar, leaving a small smudgy lipstick mark in front of you. You don't know what's worse, the fact that you're still being turned on by this, or that the size of the lips that made that mark were easily large enough to swallow you entirely. She places the jar down and steps away from it, saying "YOU'LL STAY RIGHT HERE. THE JAR WON'T MOVE FROM THIS VERY SPOT. AND YOU'LL SEE ME NAKED FROM TIME TO TIME. MAYBE YOU'LL EVEN SEE ME TOUCH MYSELF. AND I'M NOT EVEN GOING TO STOP YOU FROM TUGGING THAT LITTLE DICK OF YOURS. BUT KNOW THIS: THE MORE YOU DO IT, THE LONGER YOU'LL STAY A BUG. AND YES, I'LL BE CHECKING." She stomps out of the room for a minute, leaving you alone with your thoughts. Your gaze on the giant woman finally broken, you have a chance to look around at where she's planning on keeping you for your tenure as her pet. To your shock, she's decided to keep you...

12112131322.content: You hear Sato's voice as she stomps into the room, but to your surprise, her footsteps are accompanied by another pair of massive feet. You can feel them getting closer and closer as the conversation becomes clearer. "BY THE WAY, REBECCA... I WANTED TO SHOW YOU SOMETHING VERY... INTERESTING REGARDING MY RESEARCH." Rebecca? Is she talking about Professor Montana? She was a smoking hot redhead who worked in the biology department. Your inquiry was answered almost immediately as the door to your closet hell swung open, and you see two figures in white coats approach through the bright light. In addition to Sato, a taller woman was standing right next to her, and within seconds you came face to face with the enormous form of Rebecca Montana. Her frizzy red hair was tied back in a ponytail, letting you get a clear look at her stunned, freckled face. Her beautiful green eyes shined brightly with amazement behind her thick glasses, as she struggled to find the words to express her shock at seeing an actual tiny person. You knew the two professors were friends, so it wasn't really a surprise that the first person Sato showed her latest discovery with was Montana. The taller professor was speechless as she leaned in close to you, and whispered "NO... WAY..." Sato smiled with excitement and said "YEP. I TOLD YOU THE RAY GUN WAS IN THE TESTING STAGE. SAY HELLO TO MY FIRST LAB RAT." The frizzy haired redhead stared at you with contained excitement, like a child on christmas morning. Her friend had actually succeeded in reducing a human being to the size of a bug! Her fingertip touches the outside of the glass as you get to your feet, staring at her giant green eyes magnified through not only the glass of your prison, but also through her thick, black framed spectacles. "IT ACTUALLY WORKED... YOU SHRUNK SOMEBODY! HE'S SO CUTE!" While she was staring at you, you sprung into action, banging on the glass jar and screaming "Professor! Help me! She's crazy! Let me out of here!" Your voice only registered as squeaks to Montana as she tilted her head slightly and said "UMM, TOMIKO, I DON'T THINK THE LITTLE GUY WANTS TO BE STORED LIKE A SPECIMEN..." Sato walks over and flicks the jar, causing you to double back in surprise. "CALM DOWN. DON'T MAKE ME LEAVE YOU IN HERE AGAIN." Rebecca looks genuinely shocked as she steps back. "TOMIKO... ARE YOU OKAY? YOU SEEM A LITTLE ANGRY." Montana's face fills up your vision again as she leans in to inspect you yet again. She lets out a small "AWW" As she berates her friend. "LOOK AT HIM, YOU'VE ABSOLUTELY TERRIFIED HIM. POOR LITTLE GUY IS SO TINY AND FRAGILE. HE MUST BE SCARED HALF TO DEATH!" Sato doesn't break her stare on you and says "GOOD. HE SHOULD BE AFRAID OF ME AT THAT SIZE. I'M DEFINITELY NOT CHANGING HIM BACK. RIGHT NOW I'M TORN BETWEEN KEEPING HIM AS A SLAVE AND CRUSHING HIM LIKE A BUG." Montana's eyes go wide and she quickly looks back at you cowering in the jar, and then returns to Sato, saying "WH... WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? HE'S A STUDENT! YOU CAN'T JUST SNUFF HIM OUT LIKE AN AFTERTHOUGHT... YOU MAY HAVE SHRUNK HIM, BUT HE'S STILL A PERSON!" With a loud, exaggerated sigh, Sato steps in front of the jar and peers into it. Just her stare is terrifying enough, but then she takes her right palm and slaps the side of the container, almost knocking it over. Your body is tossed inside and you smack your face up against the glass wall, falling to the ground in pain. With a quick chuckle, Sato says "REALLY? A PERSON? I DON'T SEE A PERSON. ALL I SEE IS DISGUSTING LITTLE INSECT THAT NEEDS TO BE SQUASHED." Montana looks Sato right in the eyes and says almost in disbelief "WHAT THE HELL'S GOTTEN INTO YOU? I'VE NEVER SEEN THIS SIDE OF YOU BEFORE... WHAT WOULD MAKE YOU TREAT A PERSON LIKE THIS?" Sato's smile disappears and she says "YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW?" She leans in and cups a hand over Montana's ear, telling her of when she caught you fantasizing about her at that size and all the gross, inappropriate things you'd like to have her do to you. The giant redhead's eyes shift and expand with the realization, and her attention diverts back to you. She gets up close to the glass, and placing one hand behind the jar, she gets your absolute attention. "IS THIS TRUE? DID YOU REALLY... PLEASURE YOURSELF WITH HER IN THE ROOM?" You couldn't lie to the inquisitive giantess, and just shook your head up and down, staring at the floor. Sato breaks the awkward silence by saying "NOW DO YOU SEE WHY I WANT HIM TO BE PUNISHED? I TRUSTED HIM AND HE TOTALLY ABUSED MY FRIENDSHIP. LITTLE FUCKING PERVERT." You finally got the courage to raise your head to see into Montana's eyes and get a look at how she reacted to your confession...
12112131322.title: Sato shows you to Montana

12112131323.content:
The footsteps get closer and closer as you fear that the professor has come back to claim you after all. You're not ready for whatever sick twisted punishments she has in store for you at her massive size, so you find yourself backed all the way against the opposite end of the container as you hear giant hands turn the closet door's handle. But when the huge doors swing open, you are met with a genuinely heartwarming surprise... it's Teanna! You are confused as to why she was looking in the cabinet in the first place, until you hear her whisper "I HEARD THE DOORS CLOSE, BUT SHE WAS TALKING TO SOMEONE... WHY WOULD SHE BE TALKING TO THESE BUGS?" Your heart sinks to hear her compare you to the other similarly sized insects in jars surrounding you, but take advantage of this opportunity while you have it. You bang on the walls of the jar, screaming up at her, until her gaze is directed towards you. She bends down to peek into your jar to see what's making the noise, and it's safe to say that she's not prepared for the sight in front of her. Her pretty ebony face gazes down at you, her mouth agape. It acts as a simple reminder that at any moment you could be lost in somebody's mouth like a worthless little crumb. She worldessly wraps her huge hand around your glass prison,lifting it up out of the cabinet. You can feel her racing pulse beat through the jar as she grabs it, her eyes wide with amazement as she holds you level in front of her face.

"WHA... WHAT? JUST... WHAT?" Her astonished exclamations fog up the glass as you try to get her to calm down. You scream up at her "Teanna! Can you hear me?" She holds her free hand up to her mouth to stifle a small scream, so you can tell that she can obviously understand your little voice. You are constantly moving your feet to keep your balance, as the glass you're in is shaking from the involuntary shock of your giant friend. She is talking to herself as she looks down at you "SHE ACTUALLY DID IT... SHE'D BEEN TALKING ABOUT IT FOR YEARS BUT... SHE ACTUALLY FOUND A WAY TO SHRINK PEOPLE!" You can feel the glass get slightly warmer from Teanna's touch, her huge hand generating enough heat to raise the temperature in the jar just a few noticable degrees. "Look, I know this is weird, but you have to get me out of here. The professor has gone crazy! She shrunk me and she's going to do awful things to me when she gets back! Please, help me!" You were cautious to neglect the fact that the professor caught you in a lewd act and this was merely a punishment, but you figured it would be better for now if Teanna didn't think of you as a tiny little perv. Better she still see you as a friend who needs taking care of. She slowly nodded and tilted the glass in her hands. You slid down the edge of the glass towards the lip, where Teanna's soft palm was waiting to catch you. You stare up at Teanna's unquestionable beauty, taking in the entire face of the goddess holding you in her hand. It's easy to get caught up in how pretty girls are from this perspective, even if they could effortlessly squash you flat. You don't think Teanna is that type of girl though, not with the way she's looking down at your little body. She's almost got tears in her eyes as she holds you up to eye level. She brushes some of her long, curly hair out of her face before bringing her free hand down to touch you gently with an extended index finger. She lets out a nervous laugh before saying "YOU'RE... YOU'RE SO LIGHT. I CAN'T BELIEVE SHE ACTUALLY DID THIS TO YOU." You appreciate the sensual gesture and grab her finger with both hands, pleading up to her "Please, Teanna just get me out of here! I don't want her to shrink you too!"

The look of terror across her face as she realized you were right was priceless. She carefully closes her hand around you as she grabs the remainder of her things. You feel surprisingly safe in her grasp, just hoping she doesn't accidentally close her fingers around you and squeezing the life out of you. It's not the case though. She's got you firmly in her grasp, but her soft hand is carefully avoiding holding you too roughly. She's protecting you, and that's all you need her to do right now. She brings the fist up to her face and whispers "ALRIGHT, LET'S GET YOU BACK TO MY DORM. THEN WE'LL SEE ABOUT HELPING YOU OUT." The way she's grabbed you, her massive thumb is directly in front of your face. Almost on instinct, you lean forward in her grasp and kiss the soft finger which is slightly taller than you are. She obviously felt it because a small giggle erupts from her giant lips before she carries you out of the lab.
12112131323.title: Saved by Teanna!

1211213133.content: There is no joy in the professor's actions, no pleasure. She is determined to punish you for being such a pervert and she gets the perfect idea on how to do it. She makes her way back over to the table and reaches down with her free hand grabbing the shrink ray. The blood leaves your face as you look at her milling over the device, as if she's arguing with herself on whether or not she should actually do it. She sighs and says "YOU WERE VERY SPECIAL TO ME, BUT ALL YOU SAW ME AS WAS A MEANS TO FULFILL YOUR FANTASIES. HOW PATHETIC." Every word she says cuts like a knife, but your embarrassment turns to fear when you come face to face with the barrel of the gun that's made you this small already. You try to escape from the fingertips in a desperate attempt to avoid getting turned into a microbe, but your efforts are in vain as you hear "KEEP SQUIRMING, IT WON'T HELP YOU. YOU WANTED TO SEE ME AS A GIANTESS. I'M JUST GIVING YOU MORE OF WHAT YOU WANT." You stare in horror as the barrel begins to glow and you feel the beam strike you, making you even more miniscule between the giant Asian professor's fingers. You feel yourself get smaller and smaller, until you are no longer trapped between the fingertips, but rather free falling between them. You start to panic until you fall face first onto a landscape of flesh. You look around as you readjust to the light and see the peach colored surface you're resting on becoming more and more rigid, with the lines in the ground spreading out further apart. When you finally stop shrinking, all you can do is drop to your knees as you look up and see the humongous eye of Professor Sato trying to focus in on your insignificant form. She's made you no bigger than a grain of sand. You look behind you and see the humongous nail of the finger you're inhabiting hanging what seems like hundreds of feet overhead. You could easily fit several of yourself underneath your teacher's well manicured thumbnail. But your attention is turned back to the eyeball as you hear her booming voice speak unto you. "THERE. AM I BIG ENOUGH FOR YOU NOW?" You are almost on the verge of tears as you realize that you're going to stay as nothing but a speck on your pretty teacher's finger. Your life as you knew it is pretty much over as long as she controls your size, and just what she does with you while you're shrunk. She lets out a short proud giggle that shakes you to the core, and you know that everything this gargantuan woman does will be catastrophic. "NOW YOU DON'T HAVE TO FANTASIZE ANYMORE. YOU CAN BE CLOSE TO YOUR BIG SEXY TEACHER FOR THE REST OF YOUR LITTLE LIFE." You realize that she's going to put you someplace on her body, but can't move out of fear. What does she end up doing with your insignificant body?

SORRY TO BOTHER YOU." She casually walks out of the room, bringing her bag up to her face and re-opening it, looking directly down at her new catch. You try to maintain your balance and look up at her as she walks, and scream up at her to let you go. When you finally make your way to the top of the desk, you marvel at the sight of the giant girl what seems like hundreds of feet away resting on her massive bed. You could try using something else to pry the drive out of the slot, or just yank it out with your bare hands. Who knows how long a task as simple as that would take to someone as tiny as you! You take a deep breath and walk over to the device.

"This is Professor Tomiko Sato from Cresthaven University Lab B-56. I've officially begun testing on my first human subject as it relates to Project Gulliver. Test number one has been a reduction of 60% of his normal size. As compared to his original 70 inches or so, he has been reduced by a total of 42 inches. Plus the scent of her perfume is intoxicating when you're this close to her body... but that's not important right now as you lower your hands to cover up your shame. Further testing will be required in terms of his mental state and physical specifications, but I officially declare the first human trial of the Stature Alteration Ray a complete success." And the sudden change in your size has got to be causing some sort of imbalance in terms of blood distribution and cellular reconstruction. It's no wonder the blood would rush to the first natural place it could find." You are a bit caught off guard by her trying to reasonably explain why you'd get a hard on during the shrinking process, but it did put your mind at ease that she didn't think you were that much of a pervert. "Yes?" - a pause - "You're ready to go back to normal? Let me just finish this quickly and–"

"Actually.." - you interrupt in an influx of courage - "I was thinking if you would like... I mean if it was beneficial if we tested smaller sizes too?"

"What, like if I wanted to shrink down as well?" - she asks surprised.

"No, no.. It's just silly, I'm sorry–"

"Oh don't be a child!" - she smiles playfully - "Although you sure look like one now..." You are so embarrassed right now that you completely forget all the excitement and arousal you felt just moment earlier. "Will you say what you wanted to do or not?" - Sato demands.

"It's really stupid.." - you try to avoid answering, but she raises her eyebrows in amusement, still smiling - "I was just thinking how you mentioned 'all aspects of the gun' and since we don't know if it'll work on smaller scale, then maybe..."

"Yes?"

Answer 'I would like to be smaller please' crosses your mind, but it doesn't seem sensible enough, so instead you say: "I thought we could check if it's possible to shrink me more... Like maybe if there's a size limit or some other–"

Sato shakes her head. "There's no limit or any problems with smaller sizes" - she explains casually - "We've been experimenting with different objects, both inanimate and organic, and various sizes - from slightly larger than normal to hundreds and even thousands times smaller with no observed side effects."

She pauses. The possibility of shrinking that small and especially a thought of the Asian professor towering above you like a skyscraper or a mountain.. makes you rock hard again. We tried shrinking some lab rats and they were very.. terrified, like more than we would expect them to be, completely panicked and running all over their cage. From behind the photo frame, the two of you see two women enter the laboratory. You recognize the women as the ones who brought you the size ray in the first place! "Professor Margaret Ambrose, the blonde one," Tomiko whispers back as she pulls you back behind the photo frame. "She was a rival of mine back at university."

"'Brought it back?'" Tomiko whispers. "How did they know you had it?"
