You could barely contain yourself. You'd help the professor with whatever she wanted, and at the end of it you'd get to spend some time at your miniscule size surrounded by her gigantic feet? This day is turning out better than you ever could have imagined. Sato takes her free hand and picks up from her desk a small recording device, and says "OPERATION GULLIVER TEST REPORT NUMBER TWO-SIX-SIX... SUBJECT HAS HANDLED THE MINIATURIZATION SURPRISINGLY WELL AND IS READY TO MOVE ONTO PHASE TWO..." She places the device back onto the desk and uses her newly free hand to trace around your location in the middle of her palm. "NOW, MY LITTLE LAB PARTNER. IN ORDER FOR THE NEXT PHASE OF THE EXPERIMENT TO GO AS PLANNED, I'M GOING TO NEED TO..."
12131311.title: Lab Partner... With Benefits!

choices: Places you somewhere, then fires the gun.
Fires the gun.
121313113.content:
"I NEED TO KNOW HOW WILL SEVERAL SIZE ALTERATIONS WORK TOGETHER." she adds, leaning to you. "FIRST, I NEED TO ENLARGE YOU."
You see her leaning back and pointing the gun at you. You start quickly jump on her palm, hoping that she will understand that you don't want to grow, but it seems that she has taken it as your encouragement.
"GROWING YOU BIG IN FIVE! FOUR! THREE!" she starts, as you jump as intensively as possible. "TWO! ONE! FIRE!!!"
Your tiny stature quickly becomes engulfed in sparks, and in a moments, you notice how her palmscape becomes a mere palmyard, and then a mere palmfloor.
"Hey, Mrs. Sato!" you shout, jumping again, and this time, the feeling are completely different - now you actually feel that your jumps make her hand to tilt slightly. You estimate yourself being the size of her thumb. "Could you please change me back?"
"Don't worry, this is the next step!" you notice that her voice is not so booming as it used to be. "Any feelings beside that?"
You shake your head.
"Good!" the giantess smiles. "Partial reverse went without problems... Now, on to back to being tiny!" she points the gun back and fires.
When the sparks disappear, you find yourself in the place you like most: the palmscape! The giant eye descends from high above, focusing on you,
"AND HOW ABOUT NOW?" her voice booms, as it did minute earlier. "JUMP IF EVERYTHING IS OK!"
Is everything ok? Heck yes, and you jump, more than happy.
"GOOD. THE NEXT STEP IS..." she pauses for a moment as she checks her notes. "IS SHRINKING YOU EVEN SMALLER. JUMP IF YOU DON'T WANT THAT."
You immediately stop jumping.
"GOOD. GOD, YOU ARE GOING BE SO TINY!" the giantess booms and...
121313113.title: "CHANGE YOUR SIZE AGAIN!"

choices: You shrink not so much, maybe ten or so times smaller.
Oh, to the microscopic sizes we go! You shrink to tiny to your current size!
1213131131.content:
"FIRST, I NEED TO PLACE YOU SOMEWHERE SAFE, I DON'T WANT TO LOSE CUTE ASSISTANT LIKE YOU!" You hear giantess giggling, each giggle like thunder shaking your tiny figure. "BEING THAT TINY WILL BE EXTREMELY DANGEROUS. OH WELL, DON'T WORRY, JUST HOLD TIGHT SOMEWHERE!"
You see how her face, already blurred, starts disappearing in miles away distance: the hand you are on is lowering and within seconds, it reaches some cylindric structure on the table and stops near some glass-like surface. Giving it a second look, you realise that this structure is an optic microscope! Holding your breath, you stare at the structure. Is doctor going you to shrink till you are microscopic?
You actually forget that you need to get off the palm, and just stand still. However, a polite "ahem" above quickly brings you back to reality, and you quickly place yourself under the tube.
The glass under you surely looks different: what used to look like a smooth surface back when you were normal now has some small bumps and hills.
"ALRIGHT, I AM GOING TO SHRINK YOU FOR A SMALL TIME, MAYBE FOR A MINUTE OR TWO. HECK, FIVE MINUTES WILL BE ENOUGH. JUST LISTEN TO YOUR FEELINGS, OK? I WILL BE WATCHING YOU IN CASE SOMETHING BAD HAPPENS."
You then feel familiar tingling... Your shrinking has started!
1213131131.title: Places you somewhere, then fires the gun.

choices: The sparks appear again! You are changing your size!
Nothing happens, as you stay, small speck.
12131311312.content:
The first thing you notice is that this shrinking is taking longer time than previous ones - but you are unable to see anything but sparkles to tell how small you are going to get. All you know is that you are getting smaller and smaller with every passing moment. The only thing that is wondering you right now is how does the world will look when Sato is done? And you are not only thinking about the glass you are on, you are thinking about ordinary things like books, spoons, ah, and well, about people. Especially about Professor's noticeable body. What will it look like?
You have already imagined all possible looks, and yet, the shrinking hasn't stopped. You close your eyes as you are afraid that your eyes might go blind.
The flashes keep on going off and on for a roughly thirty seconds, and then, they go away.
Carefully, as if it will affect you somehow, you open eyes.
Miles and miles at all directions, you see only plain blue surface with mountains, hills and ravines all over the place. You stand on the ones of the hills, but you are merely shocked by how does the glass surface look at your scale. The point is, you can't even measure your own size, the only hint is the light orb sun's size very very up ahead. It does look like a sun, actually.
You slowly take a look around your little hill, as there are hills that even higher you are standing one, with a cliff on your left side that blocks your view; on the right side, however...
Is a vast blackness. It stretches from the bottom to the very top, as if it is going to consume your very small world.
Seconds later, strong gusts engulf the landscape; several winds manage to pick you, but they don't carry you for a long time and send you to the bottom of your hill.
Then, blackness disappears, following with the mass of pink and then white, only to move away and opening a blurred view.
You stay here, not knowing what to do. Of course, you were told to listen to your feelings, but as far as it goes, you feel pretty nice.
12131311312.title: Oh, to the microscopic sizes we go! You shrink ...

choices: You are growing!
You are shrinking...
121313113121.content:
You stand there, on the unknown landscape, not knowing what to do. You certainly would get bored, if you weren't afraid that professor forgot about you, or, what's worse, couldn't find you. But you shooed all negative thoughts away: surely she is adjusting the ray, and every moment she will grow you back...
The adjustment surely took its time: you waited for a minute - but in the end, the sparks appeared again!
121313113121.title: The sparks appear again! You are changing your ...

choices: She continues the experiment angrily
She traps you in a jar, treating you like a specimen
She re-enlarges you, ending the experiment
12131313.content:
Sato's giant feet tapped against the ground repeatedly, sending shockwaves through your body with every movement. The professor's look changed from one of intrigue and curiosity to outright sadness and anger. She makes a nervous laugh as if she's trying to understand everything at once before closing her eyes and whispering "SO... THAT'S WHY YOU WANTED TO HELP ME? JUST SO YOU COULD GET CLOSER TO MY FEET?" You try to deny it but your tiny voice falls on deaf ears as she continues her rant, pacing around the room. You start to get nervous as she has lost track of where you were standing, instead looking up at the sky, announcing her rage. "ALL MY HARD WORK, FOR THE BETTERMENT OF MANKIND AND YOU.... YOU JUST WANTED TO FILL SOME SICK FANTASIES ABOUT RUBBING YOUR TINY BODY UP AGAINST MY TOES. YOU ARE THE WORST, YOU KNOW THAT? JUST THE WORST."

She snaps out of her confusion and lets out an annoyed grunt saying "GREAT. NOW I'VE LOST YOU. HOPE YOU'RE QUICK, LITTLE PERVERT. THOSE FEET YOU WANTED TO KISS SO BADLY MAY JUST CRUSH YOU AS I MAKE MY WAY BACK TO THE TABLE." You stand petriied as the giant Asian professor stomps her way over to her previous position. Her gigantic bare feet slap against the hardwood as she gets closer and closer until you feel that she is going to lift her foot right over you, smushing you flat. You hang your head in shame and disgust as the shadow creeps lower and lower. You can actually feel the heat from her body as the foot lowers down on top of you... but then stops short. You open your eyes, expecting to see nothing... maybe an afterlife or something. But instead you look up to see Sato's bare foot still hovering overhead. It hangs in place for what seems like an eternity before crashing down a few yards from your miniscule body.

Sato lets out another annoyed sigh above you and said very calmly "NO... NO I COULD NEVER DO THAT. NO MATTER HOW MUCH YOU'VE ANGERED ME, I COULDN'T JUST... KILL A HUMAN BEING LIKE THAT." You were momentarily relieved until you heard Sato say "BUT THIS CERTAINLY CHANGES THINGS BETWEEN US. AND I REALLY THOUGHT WE HAD A SPECIAL CONNECTION. BUT I WAS STUPID TO THINK THAT YOU'D WANT ANYTHING TO DO WITH ME BESIDES DROOL OVER MY FEET." You've upset and betrayed the giant woman, but you're happy she's not planning on crushing you out of anger. But the ball's in her court now, what does she decide to do with you?
12131313.title: Her Trust Betrayed

choices: You make it back to your house without incident
You are stopped by someone in the apartment building
You feel the warm feeling return... uh oh.
121313133.content:
She bends down to the table and grabs the size ray, flipping a few of the controls before whispering to herself "THIS WAS A MISTAKE. I KNEW I SHOULD HAVE TRUSTED SOMEBODY ELSE." She points the device at you and places her finger on the trigger. You immediately get down on your knees and scream up at her "No professor please! Don't make me any smaller! I'm sorry!" But she pulls the trigger regardless of your pleas and you feel a familiar warmth pass through your body. You get nervous expecting to be nothing but a crumb in your angry teacher's carpet, but that's when you feel your body rising up to her height. She's made you big again! You look down at your body, checking to see that you're alright, when you see a familiar pair of bare feet step right up next to you.

"Stand up. We're done here." You get back up to your feet and say "Look, professor, about what just happened..." She just holds a hand up and says "Don't even try. You took advantage of my trust, and i can't forgive you for that right now. Just... just go. I'll see you in class. And you'd do best not to tell anyone about this." You are crushed by her words but she just walks to the door and opens it, motioning for you to leave. She tries to put on an emotionless face, but you can see beneath that she is really hurt. "Okay. Goodbye professor. And i'm sorry." She doesn't respond, she just looks down at the floor until you walk out. You turn around one more time to face her but you're just met with a slamming door. You really blew this chance, didn't you? Well, you figure there's nothing to do now but reflect on this as you make the walk down the long hallway, wanting nothing more than to go home and forget this whole thing ever happened.
121313133.title: Ending the Experiment

choices: Slide under Sato's door and try to get her attention!
Wait for someone to pass by and grab onto their shoe!
Use your phone to call for help!
1213131333.content:
You continue walking down the hallway, fretting about how you managed to screw this up. Sato was always so nice to you, and even then when she kissed you in the apartment, you thought maybe she'd be more open to being a little more than just "teacher and student." You figure the feet stuff weirded her out, but the more you dwelled on it the worse you felt. Except at the same time you also felt a small warmth growing inside you. Like a small burst of energy was coursing out of your stomach and hitting your extremities. It was eerily similar to the feeling you got when Sato hit you with that gu...

Oh. Oh no.

You look at the door to your right and begin to panic when you see the knob slowly rising up higher and higher. The gun's reversal wasn't permanent and you're shrinking again! And not only that, but unlike the last time, your clothes aren't shrinking with you. The shirt you're wearing is getting longer and taller, while your pants are having a hard time fitting around your waist. You can't waste any more time, you have to get the professor to help you! This time you could shrink away to nothing as a side effect! You make your way back to her apartment door, struggling to hold on to your clothes as you get closer and closer, until finally you reach what appears to be a ten foot all door and bang ferociously on it. "Professor! Please! Let me in!" you shout out weakly, half shocked by the realization that your voice is already much higher and squeakier than you were expecting. You are beyond relieved to hear the amazon's footsteps on the other side of the door, until the next sound shatters your hopes entirely.

"I TOLD YOU, I'M NOT SPEAKING TO YOU ANYMORE TONIGHT. GO HOME." *click*.

There goes your last hope of getting help. She's locked you out and you're sinking quickly into your clothing. You close your eyes, pretty much accepting that this is how you will go out... until you feel the warm feeling disappear. You open your eyes again, and make your way through the mountain of fabric that surrounds you. Climbing out of your shirt collar, you realize that not only have you shrunk to the same miniscule half an inch tall that you were before, but now you are all alone. The goddess of a professor is on the other side of the door and she wants nothing to do with you. So now you have to get help, otherwise you'll die alone in a sea of carpet. So what do you do?
1213131333.title: That Familiar Shrinking Feeling

choices: Her bare foot coming towards you!
Her socked foot, which had a small hole, coming right for you!
12131313331.content:
So you decide that the best course of action would be to slide under Professor Sato’s door and get her attention again. She might be upset at you, but she was your only hope for reversing your current shrunken condition. You could have tried other things, but there was really no other option when Prof. Sato held the keys for your potential size now. And besides, she wouldn’t have expected you to have re-shrunk, so she might be sympathetic to you right now. And after she fixed you again, you could just apologize and leave her alone, since she wanted some space from you for now.


As you carefully crawl under her door, and it does surprise you by just how easy it was, you make it back into Prof. Sato’s apartment. You spend a few minutes just appreciating just how everything looked at your perspective. The ceiling seemed like a far off blur or colors, the tables and things towered far over you, and her couch seemed to stretch all around you. And as you stood still, you noticed the intoxicating scent of Prof. Sato’s feet again, and you realized that you were standing right next to one of her overturned sneakers. You walk over to it and place your hand onto the soft and cushiony material, and take a moment to enjoy standing so close to Prof. Sato’s used sneaker. You’re half tempted to walk all the way inside to see what it’s like in the toe section, but you decide against it because that was the exact kind of behavior that caused Prof. Sato to become so upset and disappointed with you.


But then you hear a series of earthquakes, and you quickly surmise that Prof. Sato must be coming back into this room. You immediately hide inside of this sneaker, going deeper until you reach the toe section, and the smell increased exponentially. It seemed to completely surround you, and made it a bit difficult to breathe while you got used to this new environment. But it was still incredibly exciting and pleasurable to be completely engulfed by Prof. Sato’s natural foot scent, even if it was only whatever remained from when she last wore the sneaker. Then you started to hear, and feel, Prof. Sato’s personal earthquakes getting closer, and she eventually stopped right at her door. You could just barely see her feet, which were still bare, from your hiding spot, and they seemed even larger than they were before, most likely because you were even smaller than you were back when she first shrunk you. She opened the door and then said to herself, “I guess it wasn’t that important, huh? Although, I wonder if I was being a bit too harsh on the little guy, and maybe overreacted a bit. After all, I did invite him over just so I could try out my new shrinking ray, and he was probably overwhelmed with it all. Oh well. I’ll talk to him about it after class. And then I can tell him about the durability side effect of the shrinking too!”


You were pretty relieved to hear that stuff, but you’d still apologize for immediately going for the lewd stuff with her as well. You also thought about the last thing she mentioned, and you figured that you must have became much more durable after shrinking, although you weren’t too keen on testing that out right now. And as optimistic you were after hearing what Prof. Sato said, you also didn’t want her to find you hiding in her sneaker, because that would probably cause her to take back all of that. So you wait until the coast is clear so you can get out of her sneaker and get her attention, but Prof. Sato acts first. She picks up both of her sneakers and sets them upright, saying “Geez. I should try and keep this place a bit neater. I did have a guest here a little while ago!” She started to laugh to herself as she walked away, leaving you trapped in her sneaker for the time being. You looked at the walls, and you realized that they were too smooth for you to climb out of, so you decided to get cozy in the toe section. Since you were even smaller, you curled up in the imprint made by her big toe, and just let the amazing aroma lull you to sleep.


In the morning, you were woken up by Prof. Sato walking around and getting ready. She was feeling a bit lazy today, so she planned on wearing a pair of jeans and a casual collared shirt. She didn’t need to do any lab work today, just teach a few intro classes, so she wasn’t concerned about dressing formally. Once she was dressed, aside from her shoes, she walked closer to where you were and picked up the sneakers that you were inside of. She sat down at her couch, and you tried to shout out at her, but she didn’t even register the noise you were making. You figure that you were just too small to be noticed easily. Prof. Sato then put her right foot into the mouth of the shoe, and she started to crack her toes playfully, which turned you on immensely. You quickly saw:
12131313331.title: Seeking Prof. Sato's Assistance

choices: Trish notices you before she knocks on the door.
Trish Knocks on the door, unaware of your presence.
12131313332.content:
Emerging from the discarded clothes on the floor which belonged to you, and after being turned away from your only savior in this situation. This left you in an odd spot as the situation seemed rather hopeless for yourself. After all, the only person who knew about this was currently mad at you, and being at least above moderate intelligence, one could be sure that anyone else would not be considering the fact that a small human such as yourself existed or could even exist. This would leave a moderate if not large margin in the possibility that any sight on you would result in your untimely demise, splattered across the bottom of someones shoe. Of course, there wouldn't be a complete absence of pros to all the cons, your clothes did outfit you with some cover, and certainly someone would take notice to your discarded clothes at some point, right? If not, you could just camp out here until Professor Sato next came out of hr apartment, and hope she would be in a better mood.

For better or worse, the sound of dull thuds could be heard further down the hall way, foot steps, which were getting gradually louder and louder. Before finally a figure would emerge from around the corner and could be seen making their way down toward you. Although at your diminished stature, they may as well have been a mobile Mountain to you, there was no denying that your eyes would light up at the sight of this being, and it wasn't a good thing. Coming your way was a woman, one of your fellow students, and whilst that could be taken one way or the other, there was no good to come from this one being your aid. Trish Pierce was her name, Short raven hair, one side of her head shaved whilst the other side was swept over toward it, the style you have seen these days among the Punk community. Two green eyes which currently bore a hole down the hall as she herself wore a determined scowl upon her face.

A look many students had seen before, as Ms. Pierce was...well, a delinquent couldn't even begin to summarize this one. More accurately, she was a violent and aggressive sociopath. Who in all the time you have known of her, has been hauled off campus in handcuffs more times than you'd care to count. Quite frankly she didn't seem to care who they were, male, female, nerd or jock. She had such a short fuse that anyone who pissed her off could be found picking themselves off the ground after getting their ass kicked. Fighting, something she took quite seriously as you knew, she having taken up MMA as a hobby, but it seemed to be growing into something of a dream of hers, where you didn't doubt you'd see her one day in with the pro's, if she didn't end up locked up in prison first. For now, she just seemed to frequent the small venues which hosted sanctioned fights, and judging from her attire, she seemed to be back from such a night.

She wearing her trunks, black in color, coming down to her knees with her name printed across them in red font. A black T-shirt, which unlike her trunks which fit loosely around her legs like shorts, her shirt fit quite snugly to her upper body, only complementing the curves she had. Her hands were still wrapped in the white supportive tape around her wrist and knuckles, and she even wore a battle mark from the nights event, a fresh cut above her right eye, which was still too fresh, the bleeding having just stopped before she walked in you would wager. Although, knowing her, one would have to wonder, if that's what Trish had, then what did she do to the other girl? Last but not least, possibly the most notable feature of hers, at least for you, for one of two reasons. Her shoes, and considering what just happened between you and Sato, one reason would be rather obvious why you'd be scoping out the worn and beaten DC skater shoes that Trish was known to wear. Tough, perhaps the main reason would be the fact that they were stomping and bulldozing the carpet down in your direction, and getting closer by the second.

Silently praying to..... well anything at this point, even to Trish in your desperation, you begged that she would just move on, and not carelessly step on your clothes, and in turn possibly crush you. "That Bitch had better agree to pass me." The low rumbling which was Trish grumbling under her breath, words which would allow you some insight to just why Trish was here. It never until this point, dawning on you that she certainly did not live among these apartments. Your thoughts, as well as your prayers would be answered as Trish would come to rest outside of Sato's door, her right foot just catching the edge of your clothes, and whilst it did annoy you, the rudeness it took to tread on someone's clothing. You would just be happy that was all that ended up under her tread. Although, perhaps your better judgement was under her shoes at this point, crushed into nothing as you still may end up, because all the bad signals you got from this woman, and you still tossed them out the window for a shot at fixing this mistake as soon as possible.

After all, if Trish was here to see Professor Sato, for whatever reason, that would mean you could potentially hitch a ride inside, and hide until Trish left and get yourself fixed. This in mind, you emerged from the safety of your clothes and got a running start to just throw yourself to the side of this woman's sneaker. Your body hitting with a thud against it, and though you did hit a bit harder than intended, it didn't stop you from hoisting yourself up with what you had, Breathing hard, you couldn't help but notice something, a particular warmness which radiated off of Trish's body, and a light aroma of sweat, Looking to her ankle over the tongue of her shoe, you could see just that, droplets of moisture which when you looked up covered her entire body, signalling she must have come right over after her fight, which only made you hope that this visit was going to be a friendly one, for Sato's sake.
12131313332.title: In Walks Trouble

choices: Tell Trish Everything, about the device, about Sato.
Remain Quite, become her pet.
121313133321.content:
You couldn't help but admit, as you rested atop the tend end of Trish's DC sneaker, that this is about where you wanted to be. After all, just how long ago had you acted upon a desire which ultimately left you in the bad graces of your favorite teacher. It was now impossible to deny it to yourself that this was rather ideal, even given the violent nature of your seemingly unaware host. The heat of the sneaker beneath you, that subtle aroma in the air that her body was producing. A part of you just wondered, considering the prize of your fancy when it came to Sato,....just what would you get from this Fighter of a female. Sitting up, you made your way up the hill like tongue of her sneaker, using the laces as footholds and just overall something to grab onto as you hoisted yourself up, to which before long you found yourself at the mouth of her right shoe where the heat and that desirable smell were intensified. Immediately, you began to crawl down into it, pinning yourself against the lip of her shoe and her ankle as to not let yourself completely fall in, after all, you just wanted....a touch. Letting your hand slip out, it would come to rest upon Trish's skin, her pale skin which was surprisingly soft for her...habits.

Allowing your touch to slide down, you soon had a handful of her sock, a certain level of moisture in it which sent that feeling inside you into a frenzy. "What the Fuck?" Unfortunately for you, the bellowing voice of Trish raining down below meant that your "tour" was ended rather quickly. It taking just a few moments before you felt two fingers clasp around you like a vice, her index and thumb digging into your sides as she lifted you up, and she was far from gentle with this. Leaving you in quite a bit of pain as you were brought up before those emerald orbs of hers and that scowling face. "What the hell is this thing?" her eyes would narrow as she focused on you, before for a brief moment you could see some shock in her expression. Though it certainly wouldn't last as her expression simply hardened back into that unhappy look. "That scrub must have hit me harder than I thought, because there is no way in hell something like you exists." She would ponder in an assertive tone, the look in her eyes and the general sound of her voice making you....rather uneasy to say the least. Still, it was far too late now, better she know you were real rather than just chucking you down the hallway right?

Waving your arms back and forth, you motioned for her to take notice, and once more you noticed a change in demeanor. Although unlike before where she was shocked, she now seemed......eerily enthused. It would only get her to inspect you closer before a small grin crept over her lips. "Well, if you are real...You know, you look an awful lot like Sato's assistant." She would laugh a bit at the thought, and you only cringed at each rumble this created for you. You feared the thoughts going on inside her mind, and actually now regretted waving your arms. Being thrown to your death down the hallway actually beginning to seem more favorable to you. "Oh you are soooo fucked." She manically chuckling to herself as those words left her mouth, and you only gulped hard. Immediately her grip on you changed, her right hand taking you as her fingers wrapped around you like a tight blanket, not unpleasant until her grip tightened and you soon found the nail of her nail resting against your throat. "So here's how it's going to be, why don't you go ahead and tell me what happened to you, I mean maybe I can fix you right?" Her tone suggested little else than a friendly or helping tone. She came off quite stern, demanding even, and it made you doubted very much that was at all her intentions.

"Or, perhaps you like the idea of being my little pet, after all, I just caught you trying to dive into my shoe. Such an odd little bug, then again I guess you spent enough time trying to not get stomped on by someones foot, you must learn to appreciate them, still weird though." She would smirk evilly at you, leaving you little else but a moment to contemplate the options you were left. On one hand, you could tell Trish the truth, about the device, and about Sato, although this option could very well doom your Favorite teacher, if not the world. On the other, you could be the Martyr and just give yourself up to her and become her little pet. Trish would only find your contemplation amusing, as she could be heard giving off a knowing chuckle. 'Come on man, I already know the Professor is behind his, all I need to know is how. Although, if you just want to give yourself up to me, that's fine too." She would add, trying to push your decision a certain way, her way. In a sudden motion, Trish would turn on her heels and immediately scoop up your clothes before walking over to the nearby janitor closest just across the hall. "But know this, no one is going to find or help you, that I can promise." Her words sent a chill down your spine, there was a far more ominous message behind them as she just opened that door and tossed your clothes into the corner of the messy room. Shutting the door behind her, Trish only made her way for Sato's door again, leaving you with the biggest decision of your life. Save Sato, or potentially save yourself.
121313133321.title: Caught for a second time

choices: She feared getting Shrunk
Help you! Ulterior motive and Trish's Shrinking plans
Help you! Ulterior Motives! Trish's BIG Plan operation Super Size Me
1213131333211.content:
You relent and spend the next hour explaining everything up to this point to Trish in great detail.


Trish listens intently. After you finish Trish muses over your story.

"Wow you're a real perv still that story is interesting" mused Trish.



Trish then decided...
1213131333211.title: Tell Trish Everything, about the device, about ...

choices: She carefully places you on her desk to inspect you
She leans back and puts you on her body
She continues to drink and toys with you in her hands
1213132.content: "OKAY, LET ME JUST GET A CLOSER LOOK AT YOU. BESIDES, I THINK YOU'LL WANT TO SPEND SOME TIME AWAY FROM MY STINKY FEET." That's where she's wrong, but you wait for her to drop her huge body down and lay a finger directly next to you. You hope you'll have more time with her cute toes, but for now accept the elevator ride and climb up onto the pad of her finger. It really sinks in just how tiny you've become when you have to hoist yourself up to climb the width of your teacher's pointer finger. You are almost thrown off the first attempt as the ground rumbles with laughter. You look up to see Tomiko's face hovering above you, trying to suppress laughter. "STOP TICKLING ME AND CLIMB ON." You were finding it hard to do both at the same time, given your size, but do your best and find yourself standing in the center of Tomiko's fingertip. The world zooms quickly around you as you are brought up to the professor's pretty face, staring at you with extreme focus and excitement. She lets out a small sigh and says "PERFECT. JUST PERFECT." You were thinking to yourself that she looks almost perfect herself. The only thing that would make this moment as perfect as she says would be if she brought you up to her massive cheek so you could give her a big kiss. But you find that just the sensation of walking around on your teacher's fingertip, shrunk down to just a half an inch tall or so, is satisfying enough for now. The giantess moves her finger up between her eyes and you can see she is almost tearing with excitement having succeeded with her experiment. But then her eyes take on a different form, one that's more confident and powerful than anything else. "I CAN BARELY EVEN FEEL YOU ON MY FINGER. YOU LOOK SO TINY, AND FRAGILE, AND... TASTY." You are thrown off by that last word, and are not helped by the fact that she's brought you closer and closer to her huge mouth as she talks. You try to back away from the smiling cavern, but only end up bumping into the underside of her nail behind you. Her tongue shoots out of her mouth and slides across her lips as a satisfied moan escapes out towards you. She whispers sharply at you "YOU PROBABLY WOULDN'T FILL ME UP MUCH, BUT YOU LOOK SO DELICIOUS SHRUNK DOWN LIKE THAT. I COULD JUST EAT... YOU... UP." Your heart stops as she quickly snaps her teeth together in front of you and giggles. She can sense your dread, and her finger is brought back up to her eye, which is a lot more comforting than her mouth. "OH, DON'T WORRY, LITTLE MORSEL. I WOULDN'T EAT YOU. YOU'RE LUCKY YOU HAPPENED TO BE SHRUNK BY THE ONLY TEACHER ON CAMPUS THAT'S A VEGETARIAN. OTHERWISE I WOULDN'T HAVE HESITATED TO GOBBLE YOU UP." You are slightly terrified by the notion of being on the finger of a professor who's casually mentioning swallowing you whole, but you can't help but be entranced by the giant woman's playful nature. She carries you over to her desk and turns on the light with her free hand, her eyes never leaving you as she sits down. when she finally gets comfortable, she brushes her hair out of her face and smiles again, saying "AND BESIDES. IF I SWALLOWED YOU, WE'D HAVE TO STOP PLAYING. I WANT TO HAVE SOME MORE FUN WITH MY MICRO SIZED STUDENT."
1213132.title: Picked Up On A Fingertip

choices: "I kiss you."
"You are sexually stimulated."
"You smell my feet."
1213133.content:
You are almost overwhelmed with the urge to run up to your professor's pretty feet, when all of a sudden, they appear to shrink in size before you. Is she shrinking herself down to your height as well? No, this is happening at a different rate than when you shrank, and you seem to be almost rocketing back to your normal size! The professor jumps back in surprise and her jaw flies open at the sight of you, at your normal size, in her presence. "What? How did? You're not.... You're not small?!" You look at your hands and notice there is a slight amount of static electricity coming off of them, but otherwise you feel fine, almost like you did when you were just about to perform the experiment. Sato looks at you and her attention is drawn to your crotch, before she looks away embarrassed. "Um... your clothes... you seem to have uh... outgrown them." You look down quickly and realize that you've shreded away your miniscule clothes on the ground.... they didn't grow back with you! You hold your arms to your crotch to conceal your privates, and the professor just supresses some laughter at the situation and runs to grab you a towel. You quickly wrap it around your body and you let all the questions out. "Why didn't i stay shrunk? Was this only supposed to be temporary?" Sato nervously looks at her notes for a second and says "Well, it was an obviously untested process, so it's perfectly natural for it not to be a permanent change in size. Then again, this does change things significantly. I originally planned for this machine to be the only way to grow and shrink something. I wasn't expecting the effects to last such a short period of time." She sighs and looks over you, before saying "Regardless, thank you for your help. I know it must have been kind of scary down on the ground, and I'm glad to know you're safe." She leans in and gives you a quick kiss on the lips. She blushes a bit, almost as if she was embarassed about letting her emotions get the best of her, before she makes a small quip "You should probably take a shower. You smell a little bit like my feet."

You take a quick whiff of your arms and it's true. That little time you spent close to her toes at the size of a raisin was enough for her foot scent to wash over you. And while it was still a sweet scent to you (and somewhat of a turn on), you couldn't really leave without washing some of the stench off. So you asked if you could use her bathroom real quickly and close the door behind you. You go to run water off of the sink in order to give your face a quick wash, when you notice that your vision is dropping slowly as you face the mirror. In less than 10 seconds, you've lost enough height that it's become an alarming situation and you call out "Professor! Uh... you may want to come in here?" She opens the door to the bathroom and her hand immediately raises up to her mouth in surprise. "Oh dear! You've shrunk again! What happened?" You explain that all you did was try to wash up and the professor gets this nervous look on her face. She walks right up next to you, and smiles a bit nervously as she notices that you're now a bit shorter than her. "It's weird looking down on somebody like... nevermind! Take a seat on the couch, I'll review the studies and see if there's any reason for you to still be getting... shorter." You take a seat on the couch, marvelling at the fact that even though you've only lost a few inches at this point, maybe even a foot, the world is significantly different. You're already pointing out shelves you'd be too small to reach, tables that would make you feel like a child if you sat at. It's a remarkable experience. You also noticed that since you left the bathroom, you've stopped shrinking again, so you breathe a sigh of relief knowing that at least for the time being, you're not going to shrink by the second until you disappear completely. The professor seems to share that relief as she walks into the room and you stand up next to her to talk to her. She has a look on her face that's not really filled with worry, but more with... amusement.

"Okay, I think i've figured it out, and the results are... pretty interesting." You can't help but notice the flirtatious tone in her voice as she said the word "interesting" to you. You took a gulp and said "What... what does that mean exactly?" Tomiko takes off her glasses and crosses her arms, her defiant pose making her look even more dominant than her current height advantage would already assist her. She bites her lip and says "It would seem that you're not on a continuous cycle. Any further shrinking will be caused by outside stimuli. And i think i've narrowed down exactly what that entails." She lets out a small giggle that is on both sides enticing and nerve wracking. She obviously isn't worried about any harm befalling you, but there's that little element of excitement in her voice, that makes you think your testing for the night is far from over. She grabs you by the shoulders gently and says "I can't believe i'm about to say this, but you will shrink every time..."
1213133.title: Back to Normal... but shrinking again!

choices: With restrained excitement,  "Let's keep experimenting... but be cautious"
With a wicked grin "Let's see just how small my feet can make you..."
With overwhelming concern "Let's stop experimenting for tonight and go to bed."
12131333.content:
You say it back to her almost as if you want her to say it one more time "I'll keep shrinking the more i smell your feet?" She stifles a laugh and says "I know it sounds ridiculous, but this is still a completely new field of study. It's possible that even after re-enlarging there's a catalyst that could still cause you to shrink. And seeing as how you spent so much time around my feet, the lingering smell was probably what caused you to lose your height." You make a small glance at her feet crossed as she sits next to you, now in somewhat more awe than you were before. It was one thing when you thought the professor just had pretty feet. Now her adorable toes could have the power to shrink you in size! You cross your legs to hide your "excitement" as you ask "So uh, what... what do we do now?"

Sato sighs and takes off her glasses as she looks at you in a concerned manner. "You've lost a lot of height already, and I don't want to put you through anything else. If you want to call it a night, i can pull out the couch and let you sleep off the effects. Hopefully you'd be better by morning." She looks down at her feet and in an almost mischeivous smile, she says "Although..." You start to get excited again, but wait for her to make the first move. She removes her shoe and holds her left foot across her lap, rubbing it softly. "I am absolutely curious to see just how powerful the effects can be. We could always use the gun to re-enlarge you if you get too small, and we'd be able to see just how small i could make you using just the side effects of the gun, as opposed to the primary functions." You're undoubtedly interested in helping the teacher, and if it means you get to spend more time close to her sexy feet, you don't see a problem in the slightest! Sato puts her feet back together on the ground and says "Then again, I'm a little concerned with how unpredictable this is. I don't want you to end up lost in the carpet on a stupid hypothesis, i want to make sure you're safe. Plus it would require that you smell my feet a lot, and i don't want to put you through any more of that than you absolutely have to." You laugh to yourself, knowing that the complete opposite would be correct.

But you don't want to expose your selfish desires so quickly, and say "Well, I trust you, Professor. Whatever you want me to do, i'll do it." With a smile, Sato leans in and gives your significantly shorter body a hug as she kisses your cheek. "Thank you, you've been more helpful than you can imagine. I'll pay you back for this somehow, i promise." Your mind races with possibilities of how she could pay you back right now, but you ask "So what do you want to do?" Sato looks at you, then at her feet... and then says...
12131333.title: Her Feet can Shrink You?!

choices: It is the middle of the night, and Sato is still sound asleep
It is the middle of the night, and Sato is hovering over you?
It is the morning
121313333.content:
You are a bit disappointed, but can clearly understand where the professor is coming from. You can't let your desires get in the way of a real scientific breakthrough... plus it wouldn't really be worth it it you found yourself uncontrollably shrinking without any further information to help you get back to normal. The professor gets up and goes into the other room, producing an old white t-shirt for you to cover yourself up. "This doesn't really fit me anymore, but it should work just fine as something for you to sleep in." You are shocked to see it cover all the way down to your shins, which gets a big laugh from the oversized woman before you. She pulls out her couch into a makeshift bed, giving you a pillow and blanket to use as she wanders to the kitchen for one last glass of wine. You coyly say "Aren't you going to get me a glass too?" She smirks and says "I have a hard time sleeping and the alcohol helps. I don't want you injesting anything that could tamper with your body too much." You shrug again, as one more time you are deprived of a good time by the cruel hand of logic and scientific reasoning.

She starts to walk into her room and says "Do you need anything before i shut off the light?" You climb into the oversized bed and cover yourself up, feeling almost like a kid that's sleeping in his parents bed. You shake your head and she lets out one more smile, saying "Goodnight, my assistant. I'll see you in the morning. And hopefully that shirt will fit just a little snugger." She shuts off the light and closes the door, leaving you in darkness alone with your thoughts. Your mind plays back the amazing day you just had, and you slowly close your eyes thinking about the sexy amazon in the other room.

Your eyes shoot awake suddenly. What time is it?
121313333.title: Sleeping Over

choices: You don't want to shrink too much.... just a few quick sniffs.
You want to get a good taste... a few quick kisses should do.
You want to feel tiny again... lick her sweaty soles!
1213133331.content:
You find yourself staring at the ceiling for what seems like hours. Ever since you were first miniaturized, you couldn't get the thought of your professor's sexy feet out of your head. You'd always had a thing for feet, sure... but after this evening you felt as if nothing else mattered except getting another quick smell of her foot sweat. It may be a side effect of the gun, but you were perfectly willing to quit your life as you knew it and serve your professor's pretty petit toes. You look at your watch and see that it's 2am. The soft breathing from the other room indicates that Sato is fast asleep. You take this opportunity to get up and slowly make your way over to your sleeping professor. You don't want to wake her up, so you quietly move step by step until you see her laying on her bed. She is not wearing any blankets or sheets, just sleeping with her arms up by her head and her face tilted to the side. Her legs on the other hand are sticking straight out... with her uncovered feet on display just for you. The toes are pointing into the sky, twitching every so often with Sato's breathing. You make your way closer to the bed, intent on getting a more intimate look at them.

Almost as if to prove how inept you are at stealth, you bump your foot loudly against the edge of the bed, shaking the mattress. You hold your hands tightly over your mouth to stifle a scream as well as to react to the fact that you may have just screwed up your only chance. But to your complete surprise, Sato hasn't moved an inch. The professor isn't snoring, but you're pretty sure you've NEVER seen anyone sleep as hard as she is. Granted today was a bit much for anyone to take in, but the way she rests, you'd believe it if an earthquake would happen around her and she wouldn't be able to hear it. You kneel down before her exposed soles, taking in their beauty. The skin is soft and wrinkles, with unpainted toes standing straight up. You lean in and can feel the heat eminating off of her skin, and it drives you crazy. You take a long look at the professor's feet, before looking down at your oversized shirt. You are already pretty short. And the more time you spend at this end of her bed, the smaller you'll get. The only question is... just how far do you want to take this?
1213133331.title: While the Professor Sleeps...

choices: Professor Sato shrinks as planned
Malfunction!?
12132.content:
You can hardly believe what she just told you. Not only has your favorite professor invited you to her apartment to experiment with a top secret device, but now she's telling you to shrink her! Already you were thinking about how cute she was, you imagine that she'd look even cuter at a smaller size.

You don't have to imagine for much longer though, as Ms. Sato hands the size ray over to you. Holding the device in your hand you aim it at your professor.

"Are you ready?" You ask, anxious to fire it.

Professor Sato thinks for moment before she suddenly raises her arms. Deflated, you lower the size ray.

"Wait a second! Let me make sure everything's set right!" She exclaims.

You hand the gun to her and she quickly begins turning dials and changing the settings of the device.

"Alright, sorry about that. Here you go." Sato says, handing the size ray back to you. "Be gentle with me, okay?"

Sato flashes her signature smile at you and you smile back. At last, you get to fire the size ray at her and see that...
12132.title: She wants you to shrink her

choices: Stay at normal size
Shrink down and join her
121321.content:
Professor Sato is bathed in a bright, green energy and she immediately begins shrinking. You watch in awe as the cute japanese professor gets smaller and smaller. The process is relatively fast and in no time at all you have a tiny, living professor Sato doll standing in front of you.

Putting the size ray down, you then kneel down to get a better look at Sato's small form. She's very small, you'd guess that she wouldn't even be bigger than one of your fingers at her new size. You see that, other than being incredibly small, she looks just as she did before the shrinking, clothes and all. The whole time she's just been staring up at you, her mouth agape.

"Ms. Sato? Are you alright?" You ask.

Your words seem to shake her out of her current state and she replies, "Y-Yes... I think i'm fine..."

"Oh, good..! I was worried that the size ray may have hurt you somehow." You say.

"No. That's not it..." Sato shakes her head. "It's just... Everything is so big! I mean, I'm so small! I was just a little bit shocked is all. But now..."

Professor Sato doesn't finish her thought and instead starts wandering her apartment. You assume that she's taking in the size of everything around her. It must be exciting for her. You watch her for awhile as explores and is pretty much in awe at most everything in her apartment. She wanders pretty far away from you. But she eventually comes running back to you.

"This is all so amazing!" The professor squeaks. "Pick me up! Go on!"

Professor Sato lifts her arms up and motions for you to grab her. You're surprised by how excited she is by all of this, she's practically beaming at this point and you think that her tiny size has made her extremely cute. And you oblige your shrunken professor and gently scoop her into your hand. You lift her up to your face.

"You look like you're having fun." You gently poke at her.

"Hey!" Sato shouts trying to knock your finger away. You ease up and she continues. "I mean, this is pretty groundbreaking stuff!"

"Yeah." You agree. "But are you sure you didn't make the size ray just to mess around with it?"

"I'll admit, it is pretty exciting. But you're right we do have to do some tests still." Sato says with a more serious tone. "Or..."

"Or, what?" You ask.

"Put me down on the table, alright?" Sato asks.

You nod and carefully lower your hand to the nearby table and Professor Sato climbs off. You pull up a chair and sit down so as to better speak face-to-face with the shrunken woman.

"Like I said..." Sato begins. "We do have to take this very seriously. Even i'm not sure what possible side-effects there could be to using the size ray on people... But..."

Sato gets a sly look in her eyes.

"You could come down here and join me anyway!" Sato says.

"You want me to shrink as well?" You ask.

"Yes. If you want to. Otherwise we could just get back to business." Sato responds.

You stare at the little woman, interested in her offer. You ponder your options, shrink yourself and join Professor Sato in being tiny, or stay at your normal size and watch over your shrunken professor...

You decide to...
121321.title: She shrinks as planned

choices: You've shrunk to the size of bugs
You have grown into giants
The room looks the same... but there is a large booming noise from outside...
121322.content: Your smile couldn't be wider as you think of all the fun you could have with a doll sized professor Sato. Not helping your excitement die down is Sato letting out small sentences like "Be sure not to keep the ray on me too long. I want to be small, but not insignificant. Don't lose me in the carpet, or i'll have to punish you later for it." You are more than happy to hear these things, which only make Sato seem more sexy. But your thoughts are distracted by a whirring sound in your hand that you're unfamiliar with. The trigger seems to have collapsed onto itself in the firing stance, but rather than shoot out a beam, the gun appears to be glowing. Acting on instinct, Sato gasps loudly and runs over to you. She quickly slaps the gun out of your hands, tackling you to the ground. "Look out! It's unstable!" You both put your head down, and you can see out of the corner of your eye that the gun is shaking and brightly shooting out a heavy blue light in every direction. You are blinded by a huge wave of light bursting from the gun and everything goes white. You can't see! You hear a voice in the darkness say your name, shouting "Oh my god, are you alright! Wake up! Please!" You slowly mouth out the words "Wha... what happened?" You are still unable to see clearly but can make out the figure of your teacher standing in the basking glow before you. "Oh thank god, you're okay! There was a... a problem with the gun." You sit up and go "What do you mean, 'problem'?" Sato sighs and says very softly "The gun must have malfunctioned... it didn't shrink me like it had planned. The beam expanded into a sonic wave, which must have affected more than what was originally intended." You don't know what she's talking about until you finally get your vision back. Once you find yourself looking past the teacher's pretty but worried face, you notice your surroundings...
121322.title: Malfunction!?

choices: Plain brown shoes... it's the teacher's assistant Becky!
Black combat boots... It's the goth girl from class, Heather!
Pink hi-top sneakers... it's a random teenager!
1213221.content:
You do a double take as your vision goes just past the professor and you see an oversized couch shooting hundreds of feet up into the air as well as a massive house-sized device smoking in the distance. You've been shrunk to an unbelievably small size along with the professor. Sato starts pacing back and forth going "What the hell are we going to do now? God, i'm so stupid! I knew i should have double checked the schematics..." You stand up and acknowledge your surroundings more, feeling the thick, oversized carpet strands beneath your feet that make it hard to walk. Focusing on the air around you and seeing tiny, microscopic flecks of dirt that no normal eye could see. And then there was the professor, cute as ever, now just an inch or so tall. Seeing her body match up with the gigantic surroundings was more of a fantasy come true than anything you've ever experienced. But right now, you had to tend to her emotions and try and find a way to get back to normal. You look at the gun laying down on the floor, still at full size and say "Hey, why don't we try and use the gun again? What's the worst that can happen?" Sato looks at you like you've just grown a second head and says "The worst that could happen?! Look at us! The worst that could happen is one or both of us shrinks down into nothingness and dies on the subatomic level! I'm not touching that gun again until i figure out what caused the glitch in the first place." Defeated, you ask the flustered professor "Well then... what do you think we should do? We can't just stay here and hope it wears off, we need to do something, right?" The professor takes off her glasses, which shrunk with her, and cleans them. Very studiously and methodically she says "Well... There's only one thing we can do right now. We're too small to even activate the machine again, let alone fix it. We're going to need to get some help from somebody in the building. We should make our way into the hallway and see who's out there."

You are actually impressed with how ballsy this plan is, considering how easy it would be for one of the giant people outside the room to unknowingly crush you out of existence. "Are you sure we should do this? It seems incredibly dangerous." Sato starts walking and says "I know... but what other choice to we have? Now are you coming or not?" You give up the arguing and immediately walk up next to the professor, who seems to be fighting back a mixture of rage, disappointment, and fear all rolled into one. You try to diffuse the situation by having a casual conversation. Hell, just getting across the carpet is going to take a few minutes since you're both so small. "Not how you thought your first test would go, huh?" Sato just sighs and says "I should have paid more attention to the data. There must have been some miscalculation i passed over. I was just so excited to be able to test the device and get the preliminary results conclusive and ready to go... I shouldn't have put myself in this situation to begin with, but i'm truly sorry for getting you involved in this. You must hate me for making you small like this." She goes to wipe an apologetic tear from her eye and You know she's vulnerable, and extremely upset at herself and her situation, so instead of making things worse, you decide to be perfectly honest with her. What the hell, right? "Actually, Professor... I've always wondered what it would be like to be shrunken down like this." She stops crying and looks at you puzzled "R...Really? No, you're just saying that to make me feel better." You look her right in the eye and let the truth spill out. "No, I mean it. In one of your classes, you first talked about miniaturization and how it could someday be possible to shrink living matter down to a fraction of it's size. I fantasized about exploring rooms at the size we're at right now, seeing everything from this perspective. And... it's lived up to everything I imagined it could be like! This is an incredible breakthrough, Professor!" She takes a look around and sniffs up what remaining tears she had, before nodding and smiling. "You know what... this is actually pretty amazing. I... I never observed our surroundings but you're right! We're seeing something that, as far as we know, nobody else has seen before! A real life perspective of something other than a human! If only i'd remembered my phone or something, we could have taken pictures! Not to mention called somebody to pick us up off the damn floor" You immediately get a rush of excitement as you search through your pockets. You have your phone! Maybe you could call for help, even at this size! Sato moves in close to you with a huge smile of hope as you immediately press on your phone... only to see the battery icon flashing mockingly in your faces. You both let out a disappointed groan and you put your phone in your pocket as Sato puts her hands on her hips and stops, looking at the gigantic door that stands before you. You are more focused on the space beneath the door, and before you could say what you were thinking, the teacher next to you says it for you. "God... we're so fucking small, we can fit under the door without even bending over." You grab her hand and say in your sternest movie-actor voice "Let's do this."

She just nods and you two make your way under the door, walking into the light from the hallway on the other side. As soon as you cross the divider between Sato's blue carpet and the hallway's clashing red, Sato stands in front of you and says "Okay, I think we should try and make our way down to the east end of the hall. That's where a few of the professors live with their families. I think i'd like to avoid the students at this point, if anything just so I have one less person who knows about the experiment that doesn't need to." You nod in approval and she pulls you by the hand saying "We should be fine as long as we stay close to the wall. Follow me." Sato barely has time to spin around before a huge object slams down in front of you two, causing you to fall backwards from the force. The professor's high pitched scream rings in your ears as you look up to see a colossal shoe planted firmly in the ground! If you had taken just a few steps further into the hallway, the giant who's foot that belongs to could have smushed you both into minuscule red stains on the hardwood! The professor runs to you, embracing you tightly out of fear and breathing heavily. "My god... i wasn't... wasn't expecting that..." You both look at the giant footwear, and two things become very clear to you. First of all, using the shoe as a measuring stick, you both can't be any more than half an inch tall. Secondly, even with just that one step, you can feel a wave of perfumed air all around you. The shoe belongs to a girl. And when you finally gather your thoughts, you realize just what type of shoes they are... and what type of woman you'll be dealing with...
1213221.title: Finding Help at Bug Size

choices: Collecting bugs in labelled jars... labelled with the names of STUDENTS!
Building small model cities on her desk... and smashing them on her floor!
Taking and printing photographs... of YOU!
12132211.content:
The dirty brown shoes and knee high socks led you and Sato to both come to the conclusion that the giantess who almost obliterated the two of you was none other than Sato's own teaching assistant, Becky! She was a quiet and shy girl, always smiling or at least awkwardly grinning whenever you'd say hi. She didn't have much of a social life, she deditated most of her time on school grounds to being as up to date with Sato's research as possible. She didn't have many friends, and was considered kind of an introvert, but she knew the two of you: Better to try your luck with her rather than wait for some stranger and take your chances with them. Becky was looking something up on her phone, and that's why she stopped, so you and the professor take the opportunity and climb onto the overworn footwear. Sato screams up at her "Becky! Becky, it's me, Professor Sato! Please hear us!" Becky didn't even flinch. Your voices were too tiny for her to hear down there by her feet. If you wanted to get her attention, it'd have to be closer to eye level. As soon as Becky puts the phone to her side, Sato grabs you and says "The laces. Grab them!" You don't even hesitate a second and drop to your stomach, clutching onto the laces of the humongous shoe. You both scream as the foot is lifted into the air, dropping suddenly with a loud thud. You close your eyes and fight the nausea, knowing it's only going to get worse until she gets back into her room. Luckily, she doesn't have to stop again, and makes it to her room in just a minute or so. You manage to look over and see Sato expertly grabbing the laces with both arms, her legs grapevining the huge ropes so she doesn't get tossed around. You are amazed by how quickly she's adapting to being tiny, almost as if she's done this before...

Eventually you hear a large locking sound above you and discover that Becky's made it to her apartment. The shoe shakes violently as a huge, stocking-clad foot exits it's container, sending a wave of her foot stink over you and the teacher. Sato covers her nose and starts coughing while you... just kind of let it happen. All things considered you were a bit of a foot man and for a second you were enjoying the smell. That is, until even at your tolerance the smell became too much and you started to hold your nose yourself. Becky stomps away, dropping her bag on her bed and taking a seat at her desk. The giantess lets out a large sigh and says "NOW, WHERE WHAS I?" Sato releases her grip on the shoe and asks "Are you okay?" You wipe yourself off and say "Uh, yeah. So what's the plan from here?" Sato bites her lip and says "Well, there's no way we'll be able to get her to notice us from here. Let's make our way over to the desk and decide from there." You both hop off of the shoe and walk across Becky's short fibered carpet to reach her. "It's a good thing the strands are so short in this carpet. Otherwise we'd have a hell of a time trecking through this stuff." You laugh at her joke and are inclined to ask her "Professor, you really seem to be taking this whole situation in stride. Have you... you... know... done this before?" Her face goes red and she stammers a bit, which gives you your answer before she can even speak. "Well, I... Yes. I shrunk myself once before while working on another project. It was a prototype that the government could use to transport large crates and machinery and... i got mixed up in the crossfire. Luckily i had a friend who was working on the device with me, and she was able to change me back after just a few minutes. That project has since been cancelled, and i was sworn to secrecy once my size was restored. But it got me thinking of a more practical, simplistic device and that's when i started work on project gulliver." You are taken back by the information but have to ask her "Was the government planning on using it as a weapon?" She lets out a small murmur of disagreement and says "At first it was just for storage and transportation like I said, but cmon... you can clearly see this being used as a non-lethal weapon on a grand scale, can't you?" You hadn't thought about it like that until a few minutes ago, but now it's clear as day. It's an extremely effective, albeit unorthadox method. An entire army's worth of people can be reduced and taken prisoner effortlessly. It's actually pretty scary the possibilities this could bring up. But you don't dwell on it anymore as the smell returns to your nostrils and you both lift your shirts up over your nose to breath normally. "God, her feet stink! We have to get as far away from those damn things as possible!" You nod your head and look to the side of her oversized desk, spying a telephone cable. "Hey, we can climb the telephone wire and make our way up to the desk from there. It's probably the safest way to get up there without climbing Becky herself." Sato smiles and says "Great. Lead the way, i'll follow you right up." You make your way to the loose hanging wire and wrap your arms and legs around it, slowly scaling the side of Becky's desk. You can see the professor behind you, effortlessly lifting herself up the cable. "Wow, she's in incredible shape for a teacher" you think to yourself as you turn your attention back to the task ahead. You finally make your way up tot he ledge and turn to face the giantess. She wasn't unatractive, by any means, just kind of dorky and unclean. Her skin was a bit oily, and her thick glasses got in the way a bit in terms of showing off her normally pretty eyes and long brown hair. She was obviously working hard on the project that was occupying her workspace, and before you could take a good look as to what it was, you heard a familiar tiny voice shout out "A little help here?" You hoist Sato up onto the desk and make your way to the giant dork toiling away at her desk. You and Sato split up a bit on the desk and you find yourself behind a box of art supplies. You figure that what she's doing is a bit more creative than scientific, so you aren't worried about getting hit by any random electric shocks or bright lights. You are about to raise your arms to get her attention, when a pair of soft hands covers your mouth and pulls your arms down. Sato drags you back behind a gigantic jewelry box on the desk and presses you up against it. She says very softly "I... I don't think this is a good idea after all. We should try for somebody else." You push her hands away and go "What? Why?" Sato looked very serious and frightened when she said "Did you get a look at what she was working on?" You are confused and look back around the corner of the box and see her humongous hands working tirelessly on something, and when you discover what it is, you realize that she's not the innocent girl you thought she was...

What is she doing?
12132211.title: Becky's Unusual Hobby

choices: "I failed her last year.  She's never forgiven me!"
"She's got a lot of dangerous friends."
"She... expressed an interest in me last year.
12132212.content:
She was an imposing, black clothed mountain of womanhood. Her name was Heather. She was a senior at the college and was the absolute walking stereotype of "goth girl". She had long blonde hair in pigtails, which framed her cute, chubby face. She wore deep black mascara and all black clothes, including fishnet stockings, a long black skirt, a thick leather jacket, and black combat boots. The boots, by the way, were standing still and not moving, due to Heather stopping in the middle of the hallway to text somebody. Sato's face goes cold as she says "It's... It's Heather... We're like bugs at Heather's feet..." You look over at the professor and let out a small relieved smile. "You know her? Great! We can get her attention!" You put your hands up to your mouth and shout "Heather! Heather, Down Here! Watch Your Feet!" Sato puts a hand up to your mouth and says "No! No! Please, we can get help from anybody else, just not her!"

Before you can ask why, a huge rumbling noise almost deafens you as the giant boots shift position and center themselves with you two in the middle. Heather's humongous form crouches down and with a puzzled look she says "WHAT? WAS SOMETHING CALLING ME?" Sato shivers with fright and says "We're too late... she's spotted us..." She was only half right, as Heather's big eyes couldn't really make out your tiny features. She lets out an inquisitive "HMMM" before centering her vision on the two of you. "I THOUGHT I HEARD SOMETHING... WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU? YOU'RE LIKE BUGS, BUT... PEOPLE!" Her huge hand reaches down for the two of you and you push the screaming professor out of the way, taking the bullet as the huge thumb and forefinger lift you off the ground. The larger than average goth's pudgy fingers squeezed you gently as she lifted you up to one massive eye, and to your shock, she recognizes you.

"WAIT A MINUTE! YOU'RE THAT FRESHMAN FROM MY PHYSICS CLASS LAST YEAR! THE ONE THAT WAS ALWAYS SUCKING UP TO THE PROFESSOR! GOD, YOU'RE REALLY FUCKING TINY! DID SHE DO THIS TO YOU? I KNEW THAT CRAZY CHICK WAS UP TO SOME WEIRD EXPERIMENTS!" You didn't want to answer but you must have inadvertantly gazed down at the goth girl's feet, because she caught onto your movements and inspected the ground at her shoes. With a quick, powerful laugh, she waved down to the shrunken professor and said "HA! LOOK AT THAT! A TINY PROFESSOR SATO! HEY, THERE, PROFESSOR, DO YOU REMEMBER ME! LET ME GET YOU OFF THE GROUND SO I CAN GET A GOOD LOOK AT YA!" The professor let out a high pitched scream and ran a few inches at a time trying to escape the giant emo girl.

All Heather had to do was inch her foot just a bit to reach the tiny teacher and grab her wriggling body in her free hand. "YOU ACTUALLY THOUGHT YOU COULD RUN AWAY FROM ME? THAT'S SO CUTE!" She holds both of her hands up at eye level and gazes lovingly at the two of you. She licks her lips and lets out a small chuckle. "TWO HELPLESS LITTLE SHORTIES IN MY HANDS. DON'T WORRY, I'M GONNA TAKE REAL GOOD CARE OF YOU GUYS." She cocks an eyebrow and stares at Sato before whispering "ESPECIALLY YOU, PROFESSOR." She giggles and opens up a pocket in the front of her jacket, carefully depositing the two of you inside, pressing up against her huge breast. She pats the pocket secure from the outside and says "COME ON... LET'S GET YOU GUYS BACK TO MY ROOM." You hear her thunderous footsteps and continuous, satisfied moans as she walks to the room.

Sato crawls over to the side of the pocket that you're in and says "Are you alright?" You shake yourself off and say "Yeah... all things considered. What the hell just happened there?" Sato looks around for a second before hugging you tightly against her. "Look, i don't want to freak you out, but I'm a little terrified being at being in her possession right now..." You start to get a little worried and ask "Why? I mean... she seems alright. A little off, but alright... right?" Sato just looks you right in the eyes and says "We should try to get out of here. You were there when I had her in my class last year. But the way she just looked at me, it was like me being this tiny and pathetic in her hands was the greatest thing to happen to her... She's got bad intentions on her mind." You are interested to know what she's talking about but just can't put the two and two together. "I still don't see why i should be as scared as you are..." Sato just sighs and says "Because..."
12132212.title: Captured by the Goth!

choices: She shoots herself in the hand!
She points the gun right at your head!
She decides to shrink someone in her building
12133.content: She gets up from the the couch and makes her way over to the safe in the corner of the room. After putting in the combination, she opens the latch and removes the special case you saw her walk out of the building with before. She smiles and hums to herself as she opens up the case and pulls the gun out. "Come here, I want to show you something i found out about the gun today." You slowly make your way over to the kitchen table and have a seat on one of the stools around it. She messes with the gun and says "Now, when you got this gun at your house, did you shoot anything with it?" You nod and say "Yeah, i uh... i shot my couch with it... but i turned it back to normal right away." She tilts her head and asks "Did the couch have any cushions on it, or was it all one piece?" You look back at her puzzled, not really understanding what this has to do with the current situation and say "Uh... i don't know. I guess all one piece?" She smiles and says "Just what i was thinking. See, earlier today i took the gun out and shot a plastic cup on my table. The cup shrank just like i wanted it to. But to my surprise, it was sitting on a coaster which remained untouched. Which gave me a whole new perspective on what the gun's range includes." She walks right over next to you and points the gun at her own arm. You think for a second she's going to try and shoot herself with the gun, until you see the beam strike her silver plated wristwatch. The watch glows bright red and then seems to slide off of her arm, landing on the table with a big thud. She smiles and says "This means that the gun is very specific on what it will shrink. It has to come in direct contact, there's no collateral damage. That's why i didn't shrink with it." She presses a few buttons on the side of the gun and points the gun at you quickly, saying very playfully "Do me a favor and hold still?" Before you can respond, she pulls the trigger and you brace for the gun to strike you again. However, her aim is off a bit and she ends up shooting just below your body. You don't know what she was going for, until you feel the stool you're stitting on get thinner and thinner, eventually cracking as it becomes too small. Sato snorts with laughter as the chair buckles beneath your weight and you come crashing to the floor. She walks over to you, giving you a hand up off the floor and saying "See? Just because it's touching you doesn't mean you shrink with it. It's a little more controlled of a blast than i was expecting when i first thought up the device, but I guess there are some positives to this. It means the machine won't go crazy on me and... i don't know... shrink the whole apartment down with whatever i'm aiming at." She brushes off your back and laughs saying "Now then. I think we're ready for human testing, don't you?" You are actually excited to see what it feels like to be shrunk, it's something you've caught yourself fantasizing about from time to time (WITH the professor being the giant in that situation no less!). Not to mention, if Sato decides to test the gun on herself first, you're more than a little curious to see what she's hiding underneath those clothes. You nod your head and get ready for the first step in the most amazing night of your life. Sato smirks and says "Alright then. Let's do this."
12133.title: It Won't Shrink Everything at Once...

choices: 3 feet
smaller
