121331.title: She shoots herself in the hand!

choices: The Dean of the college!
Professor Jones, the nastiest teacher on campus!
Vari, the suck-up foreign exchange student!
121333.content: "Wait, let me finish my drink..." Before she leaves the room with the gun in her hand, Sato takes your drink by mistake, which was in all honesty pretty full, and downs it relatively quckly. With a few gulps, she's taken in about twice as much alcohol as she already had in her system. You think this is a bad mix, knowing that she'll have the power to turn people into dolls or smaller, and now she's kind of drunk. She laughs and almost trips over herself as she makes her way to the door. She opens it and points out saying "I've wanted to do this for YEARS... let's go shrink somebody!" You slowly approach her and put your hand on her shoulder saying "Professor... are you sure you're okay to do this?" She just smiles and puts her hand on your cheek saying "I've been working on this device for four whole years now. I've waited a long time to test it out, and now I finally have the ability to do so. Trust me, I'm ready." You decide to agree with her for now, and trust her judgement, hoping that she's still sober enough to make rational decisions. You don't want her getting too moody when she's completely capable of turning you into an ant and squashing you flat. The two of you wander down the hallway, passing door after door of potential test subjects. This whole building is inhabited mostly by people from campus. Students, teachers, staff. So you have a feeling that this is a very personal mission she's on as she takes you to a door at the end of the hallway and points to it. "That's the one. This is going to be great." Sato pulls the gun up to her chest and presses a button on it's handle, making it hum back to life. With a confident smirk, Sato knocks on the door and giggles a bit as she hears footsteps approaching from inside. "She's lived next to me for about a year now... and all I've ever wanted to do was take her down a few pegs... it's gonna be so great seeing her turn into a little shrinky dink at my feet!" Sato stops laughing when she hears the door's lock unlatch. She points the gun at the eyehole and waits for the door to swing open. When it does, it takes the person a split second before she realizes that the cute Asian woman is pointing a gun at her! Before they can react, Sato pulls the trigger! Who did she shrink?
121333.title: A Drunken (Shrunken) Expedition!

choices: You!
The Professor!
Someone outside the window!
122.content: You've had a class or two with Professor Montana, and if there was one word you would use to describe her, it was CLUMSY. For a chemistry teacher, she would constantly drop samples or trip over herself. In other words, she wasn't the safest person to look for in this situation, but since she was the only person in the building, you decided to see if she could help. Teanna leads you to her lab where she's working on a series of mixtures very carefully. "Excuse me, Professor?" You startle her as she whips her head around, letting her large, frizzy mane of red hair flop from side to side. She was very skinny and tall, with freckles and pretty green eyes hidden behind ridiculously thick black framed glasses. She was in her mid-thirties, but looked to be about 28 for all intents and purposes. She catches her breath and says "Oh, Hi... you startled me, umm... what can I do for you?" You take the gun out of your bag and present it to Montana, and her eyes go wide with interest. "Oh my, that's quite a machine you've got there... it looks like something Professor Sato would have been working on..." You were pleased to hear that your favorite teacher was responsible for the device, but you figured you'd hear as much as you could about it. Montana holds it in her hands, turning it around to study it, when suddenly her phone rings. Montana's jittery hands accidentally drop the gun, and when it hits the floor, a bright green beam shoots out of it! Both of you watch in amazement as the laser hits...
122.title: Professor Montana's Mistake

choices: 1 foot tall, staring at Montana's shins!
5 inches tall, staring at her giant feet!
1/4 of an inch tall, just a speck on the ground!
1221.content: "Oh dear, are.. are you okay?" Montana goes to put a hand on your shoulder, making sure that you weren't affected by the ray. You aren't hurt, but you're made incredibly uneasy by the shocked look on the professor's face. Your frame of vision drops below her chin, then to her breasts, and soon you're looking up in fear as the already tall visage of the redheaded professor grows larger and larger in front of you. The professor clasps her hands to her mouth and booms down at you in a much louder voice "OH MY GOD, I'M SORRY! I DIDN'T MEAN FOR THIS TO HAPPEN! YOU'RE GETTING SO MUCH SMALLER!" You start to feel dizzy as the world expands around you and you close your eyes to get rid of the nausea. When you finally feel the room stop spinning, you open your eyes back again and stare back up at your humongous professor. The ray has shrunk you down to nothing more than...
1221.title: Accidentally Shrunk!

choices: "LET ME GET THE GUN...I CAN FIX THIS!"  (She shoots you with the gun again)

"NOBODY CAN KNOW ABOUT THIS, I'LL LOSE MY JOB!"  (She puts you in her pocket)
12212.content: "ARE YOU HURT?" The massive professor booms down at you, trying to keep her frizzy hair out of her face as she looks down at her feet. You aren't hurt, that's for sure, but you don't really know how to comprehend this situation. Your'e the size of a small doll looking straight ahead and seeing nothing but the gargantuan toes of the ditzy redhead. You have been shrunk so small, it's almost overwhelming. But you pan your vision up to see the gigantic professor bent down to get a better look at you. You wave your arm in kind of a half-assed way of letting her know that you're okay, and she breathes a sigh of relief saying "I... I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT THE EFFECTS OF THE GUN WOULD HAVE ON YOU... YOU SEEM TO BE ALRIGHT JUST... YOU KNOW... TEENY." You yell up that you feel a little dizzy, but stop when you see her put on a confused face. "SORRY, I CAN'T QUITE HEAR YOU... LET ME PICK YOU UP!" Her hand darts down quickly and your body is trapped between the pretty teacher's thumb and forefinger. She lifts you up a bit before depositing you safely in the warm palm of her other hand. She rises to her full height and all you can say is "Wow..." as she holds you at chest level with her free hand cradling the other so as not to drop you. Her very attractive face beams down on you, her concerned eyes framed by her thick black glasses as she says "YOU'RE SO LIGHT AND FRAGILE LIKE THIS... I DON'T WANT ANYTHING ELSE TO HAPPEN TO YOU." You sit down in the center of her palm, rubbing your hand against the lines in hers, really taking in the situation. The professor bites her lip and says "OH GOD, THIS IS BAD... THIS IS REALLY... REALLY BAD!" She is kind of having a minor freakout with you in her hand. You yell up at her to stop so that you can avoid being tossed from the giantess's hand, and she listens, taking a deep breath. She looks down at you and says...
12212.title: 3 inches tall, staring just over her toes!

Accidents happen
122121.content: " I got this under control!" The clumsy redhead said, aiming the gun at you and firing, which seemed like she was too quick to aim.

You shrink more!

1221212.title: Accidents happen

choices: You agree to stick around for some experiments, even at a smaller size.
You agree to stick around for some experiments... but only if she makes you big.
You ask to go home.. after she's made you big of course.
122122.content:
With a look of deep concern, Montana lowers you to chest level and scans the hallway before exiting the lab. The earth sways and moves around you as the gigantic professor carefully carries you out into the hall and down a corridor of storage and faculty offices. She keeps you cradled under her enormouse breasts in order to press you against them at a moment's notice, should someone be walking down the hallway at the same time as her. A little part of you was kind of excited to be pressed up against them at that size, but alas it was not to be. The redhead knocks on the door of the assistant to the head of the science department, Professor Tomiko Sato. She was a brilliant woman, and supposedly the one in charge of this whole shrink ray business. So Montana pushes her way into the office with her free hand and says "TOMIKO, I UH... HAVE SOMETHING YOU'RE GOING TO WANT TO SEE." You see from your position in Montana's palm that professor Sato is sitting at her desk working on some paperwork. With an eager smile she greets your protectress "OF COURSE, BECKY. WHAT IS IT?" Montana makes her way over to her colleague, and holds her palm out presenting you. You've always thought that the professor was pretty, but from this angle she is an absolute goddess staring down at you. It takes the giant Japanese beauty a second to realize that you are not some sort of doll, but rather a human. "WHA... IS HE REAL? I RECOGNIZE HIM FROM CLASS! BECKY, YOU SHRUNK ONE OF MY STUDENTS?!" Montana holds her other hand up in protest and says "IT WAS AN ACCIDENT, I SWEAR! HE CAME INTO THE LAB TODAY WITH THE RAY GUN, AND IT ZAPPED HIM WHEN IT FELL OFF THE COUNTER!" Sato's eyes dart down to you and she says very intrigued "YOU HAD MY DEVICE? HOW? YOU KNOW WHAT, IT'S NOT IMPORTANT RIGHT NOW. WHERE'S THE GUN, I WANT TO MAKE SURE IT'S NOT DAMAGED."

Montana places you gently on Professor Sato's desk and stomps back to her lab to grab the shrink ray. As soon as she leaves, you feel a dark shadow approach, and you spin around to see the professor's beautiful face staring down at you. She's got an enormous smile across her face as she adjusts her glasses, further studying you. "THIS IS INCREDIBLE! WE WEREN'T SUPPOSED TO MOVE ONTO HUMAN TESTING FOR A FEW WEEKS, BUT I GUESS THAT TIMETABLE HAS BEEN PUSHED A BIT AHEAD! ARE YOU FEELING OKAY?" You look up at her still a little intimidated and say "Y... Yes? I mean, i felt a little dizzy before, but other than that I guess I'm okay." She bites her lip and says "HMMM... A SMALL AMOUNT OF NAUSEA IS PERFECTLY NATURAL. AFTER ALL, YOU DID DROP A SIGNIFICANT AMOUNT OF HEIGHT IN A RELATIVELY QUICK AMOUNT OF TIME. YOUR BODY'S METABOLISM MUST HAVE HAD A HELL OF A TIME TRYING TO ADJUST TO YOUR SURROUNDINGS." She opens a notepad and begins writing some notes on your condition with a pen that's twice the size of your entire body length. In fact, doing a quick comparison, the Professor is a bit more petite than Montana, with smaller hands and shorter fingers. But that doesn't mean that from your perspective she still wouldn't be large enough to crush your body easily between two fingers. You have a feeling she wouldn't be all about that though, she seems too gentle and sweet to let that happen. A few seconds later, Montana comes back and hands the gun off to Sato, who fiddles with it a bit in her hands before saying "ALRIGHT, IT SHOULDN'T TAKE TOO LONG TO GET THIS BACK TO WORKING CONDITION. GRAB THE USUAL SUPPLIES AND WE CAN CONTINUE WORKING RIGHT NOW."

As Montana leaves you along with the Japanese giantess yet again, you can't help but gaze up at her in awe. You sit down on an oversized eraser staring wordlessly at Professor Sato's hands as she grabs a small screwdriver and meticulously works on the gun. You can't believe extremities that large and threatening could move with such swift precision and grace. Then again, everything is pretty remarkable from down there. Without looking up from her work, Sato smiles and says "I'LL BET YOU CAN'T WAIT FOR ME TO FINISH, HUH?" You look up at her in confusion and she gives you a small glance over. "YOU'VE BEEN STARING AT THE GUN THE WHOLE TIME YOU'VE BEEN HERE. I'LL BET YOU CAN'T WAIT FOR IT TO WORK AGAIN. EVERYTHING MUST BE SOMEWHAT OVERWHELMING." You can't lie to her, it is a bit much to take in at once. Every little thing is magnified, so you get a closer look at textures and colors. Even smells around you seem to be sharper and stronger. Like the giant professor's strawberry-scented hand lotion. You can smell it from even what seems like (from your perspective) yards away. The giantess raises her eyebrows and says "OF COURSE, THERE'S STILL A LOT YOU CAN DO FOR US AT THAT SIZE IF YOU WERE WILLING TO STAY SHRUNK FOR A LITTLE WHILE LONGER." You jump off the eraser and move closer to her huge body, calling up to her "How much longer are we talking?" She shrugs her shoulders and says "AN HOUR, MAYBE TWO. IT ALL DEPENDS ON HOW WILLING YOU ARE TO COOPERATE AND WHAT TESTS WE CAN THINK TO RUN. THIS GUN PRESENTS A PLETHORA OF POSSIBILITIES WHEN IT COMES TO HUMAN STATURE, AND WE WANT TO GET AS MUCH DATA COLLECTED AS WE CAN." She screws in one final section of the gun, and the machine whirs back to life. You step back away from the massive machine, hoping it doesn't instantly backfire near you. The Professor looks down at you and lowers a huge, powerful hand behind you, almost cradling you in a soft coccoon of skin. "DON'T WORRY. IT'LL BE PERFECTLY SAFE, AND WHEN IT'S ALL OVER WE'LL GROW YOU RIGHT BACK. WE'D BE ETERNALLY GRATEFUL IF YOU HELPED US WITH OUR EXPERIMENTS... WHAT DO YOU SAY?"
122122.title: Shown to Professor Sato

choices: "SHRINK YOU!  YOU CAN GET YOUR RESEARCH BACK IN SECRET!"
"SHRINK HER!  YOU CAN MAKE HER TELL YOU EVERYTHING!"
1221221.content:
You look up at the Professor's caring eyes, and just can't say no to her. "Alright, I'll stay shrunk for a while. But can i get some sort of extra credit or something?" The giant woman's eyes light up and the hand behind you lifts you up softly towards her massive face. It comes to a rest just before her eyes and you can see she's so happy she's almost crying. "TRUST ME, YOU'LL BE REWARDED IN WAYS YOU CAN'T POSSIBLY IMAGINE WHEN WE'RE FINISHED HERE." Is... is she hitting on you? You don't have much time to think about it because behind Sato comes a booming voice that is recognizably NOT that of Professor Montana. "TALKING TO YOUR EXPERIMENTS AGAIN, TOMIKO?" The professor's eyes go wide and you barely manage to sneak out a squeak of objection as her huge fingers come closing in around you, trapping you in her palm. "OH, HELLO, I DIDN'T HEAR YOU COME IN AGATHA! WHAT CAN I... UH... DO FOR YOU?" Agatha? She must be talking to Professor Jones, the head of the physics department. She ran the entire science wing of the campus, and was by all accounts a colossal bitch. Now more so than ever because, well, she was the size of the Chrysler building. Even muffled by the soft, warm skin of Professor Sato's hand, you can hear Jones' thick british accent as she trades barbs with the significantly more beautiful woman holding you. "I NOTICED YOU HAVEN'T FILLED OUT A REQUEST FORM FOR USE OF THIS LABORATORY FOR SUCH A LATE HOUR. YOU SHOULD HAVE CONSULTED WITH ME BEFORE ENGAGING IN ANY SHODDILY THOUGHT OUT EXPERIMENTS." You can feel the Asian giant's rage as you sit in her palm when her fingers grow subconsciously tighter around you. "SHODDILY THOUGHT OUT? I AM ON THE VERGE OF SOMETHING ABSOLUTELY EXTRAORDINARY HERE!" Jones just gives a condescending laugh and says "HA! EXTRAORDINARY? THAT'S WHAT YOU SAID LAST WEEK ABOUT THAT RUBBISH MINIATURIZATION PROJECT. I'M GLAD THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS LISTENED TO ME AND FORCED YOU TO PUT A STOP TO THAT NONSENSE. NOW CLEAR OUT IN THE NEXT TEN MINUTES OR I'LL BE FORCED TO PASS ALONG A RECOMMENDATION THAT YOUR SERVICES AT THIS COLLEGE ARE NO LONGER OF IMPORTANCE TO ME." She storms out of the room, bumping into Professor Montana who was returning with the equipment Sato requested of her. "AND THAT GOES FOR YOU TOO, YOU FIRE-CROTCHED CLUTZ."

The grip around you loosens and you feel the palm straighten out in front of Sato's body as Professor Jones locks herself away in her office. Montana lets out a sigh of relief and says with her arms crossed "NOW WHAT WAS THAT ALL ABOUT?" Sato puts a hand up to her head and exhales loudly "UGH, WHAT DO YOU THINK? SHE'S IMPOSSIBLE TO WORK FOR! IT'S ALMOST LIKE SHE DOESN'T APPRECIATE THE SCIENTIFIC PROCESS AT ALL!" Rebecca points down to you in the middle of the teacher's giant palm and smirks "SO WHY NOT JUST SHOW HER YOUR LITTLE SUCCESS THERE?" Sato looks down at you and playfully strokes your back, almost like someone would a tiny pet or lab rat. "PLEASE, BEX. YOU KNOW SHE'D TAKE FULL CREDIT FOR THE WORK WE BOTH DID ON THIS MACHINE. AND BESIDES, WHO KNOWS WHAT SHE'D DO TO HIM WHEN SHE FOUND HIM. PROBABLY DISECT HIM AND KEEP HIS REMAINS IN A JAR." You start to gulp heavily and look up at Montana for confirmation that Sato is joking, but instead you find a nod of agreement. "YEAH, SHE IS VERY THOROUGH." You immediately regret being so small and so close to her. But Sato's gentle rubbing seems to calm you down much more than you anticipated it would, it's actually quite soothing. Sato places you down on the desk in front of her, and lays her hands down flat in front of you to support herself as she leans on the countertop. She drums her fingers methodically and whispers "IF ONLY THERE WAS SOME WAY TO GET HER OUT OF MY HAIR. BUT SHE'S TAKEN ALL MY RESEARCH AND DATA AND KEPT IT FOR HERSELF, SO I'M STUCK HERE. I NEED A WAY OUT OF THIS LAB AND AWAY FROM HER!" There is a brief moment of silence before the redheaded giantess to your side jumps up and down with glee. The shockwaves of her feet leaving the earth and then crashing back down are almost enough to make you fall to your feet, but you somehow keep your balance. "OOH! I HAVE THE PERFECT IDEA! AND WE CAN MAKE IT ANOTHER TEST FOR THE PROJECT!" Sato raises an eyebrow and says "OH YEAH, WHAT'S THAT?" Montana reaches across the table and grabs the size ray with both hands. Considering the last time she held it, you are understandably nervous as she grips the handle and holds the barrel steady in front of her. "WE HAVE A MACHINE THAT CAN SHRINK PEOPLE. AND I JUDGING BY THE TINY PERSON AT YOUR FINGERTIPS, IT'S OBVIOUS THAT IT WORKS CORRECTLY." Sato looks down at you again, with a small cocky grin like she was immediately proud again of how small you've become. "YEAH, SO?" Montana's face is adorned with a wicked, powerful grin, as she says "SO I'M SAYING THAT WE USE THE GUN TO..."
1221221.title: Staying Small... For Science!

They stop and comptenplate your idea
Heck yea lets do it! Normal size you and  and 2 Giantesses in the making!

The miniature professor next to you is the first to talk as she lets out "Groveling like a bug at the feet of that bitch. I can't believe i'm doing this." You sigh and say "You don't have to. I'll climb onto the foot and get her attention. You just stay down here and try not to get stepped on." She lets out a grunt and says "Well, hurry up then. I don't want to get any more dust from the bloody carpet all over my clothes." You hoist yourself up on the flat bottom of the shoe and stare forward at the pretty feet of Professor Sato. There's no doubt in your mind, you've always found her attractive, but there was also a little voice in your head that said her feet were gorgeous. And today was no exception, even with your change in perspective. The nails were unpainted and trimmed, and the skin was smooth and soft. You could smell the lotion she had applied that morning mixed with a fine layer of sweat and it drove you crazy. Maybe it's because you were so small and her body was so big, but her pheremones were making you a little more susceptible to her charms than usual. You walk in between her massive big and little toe and look up at the goddess you're about to contact and whisper "She's absolutely beautiful." You can't resist the opportunity and bend over to give the big toe a slight kiss. You lick the taste off of your lips and proceed to bang with both fists on the rigid nail of the toe. This gets her attention in a big way as the toes snap at your sides, clenching in reaction. Her voice changes from an amused giggle to harsh realization very quickly, "HEHE... OH GOD! YOU'RE THERE, AREN'T YOU! ARE YOU HURT?!" She bends down to look at you and from your position you manage to squeeze your arm out and wave at the giant woman. She moves her toes apart slightly, allowing you to breath again, and scans the foot for any more signs of life. She gets the look of realization again and says "AHA! GOT YOU PROFESSOR! JUST HOLD STILL, I'LL HAVE YOU OFF THE GROUND IN NO TIME!" reaching down with both hands, the professor grabs you in one, and Jones in another, lifting you up to her face. Almost as if she's forgotten that she needs to help you, a huge smile comes across her face and she almost tears up. "IT WORKS... MY INVENTION WORKS!" The squeaks from the shrunken faculty member in her hands as Jones shouts a tirade at the giantess who's holding her in between a thumb and forefinger. "Put us down and get us back to normal, you dumb oaf!" Sato's eyes snap back to reality as she goes "OH... OF COURSE... HOLD STILL, OKAY?" The professor gently places you and the other shrunken person down on the desk and steps back with the gun in hand. After fiddling with the dials for a few seconds she goes "OKAY... DON'T MOVE!" She pulls the trigger and almost instantaneously, the woman next to you begins to expand quickly. When she reaches about her normal size, you feel a warm sensation go through your body and you rise up to meet her. Before you know it, the two of you are back to your normal size, sitting on the edge of the desk. Sato breathes a sigh of relief as she approaches the two of you. She puts the gun down and gives you a hug, almost crying again. "Thank God I was able to find you. Who knows what could have happened if you were miniaturized without anyone else knowing for too long... i don't even want to think about it. I'm just glad you're safe." You look her in the eyes and see her joy at not only her experiment being a resounding success, but one of her key students unharmed by the process. You can't bother to tell her about Jones' intentions for you and say "Thanks professor. I was looking to give you back the gun, but it... malfunctioned when i was talking to professor Jones. That's why we were on the ground." Sato looks over at the professor and says "Is this true? I'll probably need to run some more tests then, make sure it's failproof. Then we can go into patenting the damn thing. The school's going to make a lot of money from this invention!" Jones lets off a bit of a smirk, and you can see evil intentions brewing in her mind. You don't have time to react though, as she reaches down next to her and whips the gun up, pointing it at the Japanese woman's head. Sato's face goes pale as she realizes what's happening, and holds her arms up to calm down the crazy Brit. You really shouldn't have trusted her to get back to normal. But that's all hindsight now and you have to think of a way to appease the woman holding the gun. Sato takes a big gulp and says "A...Agatha... whatever you're thinking about doing, don't. It's not right." Jones stands up and cockily walks across the room, pointing the gun at Sato the entire time. "Not Right? NOT RIGHT?!! You know what I think isn't right? Being turned into a bloody cockroach in my own office, and having to depend on the likes of you to get changed back! If that little shit hadn't come into my office in the first place, i wouldn't have been in that situation! But now I have the power. And i think it's time we tested it out on you, Toshi!" The terrified professor looks back at you, almost as if she's begging you to go get help. You start to inch your way out the door, but Jones reaches up with the gun and points at you. "OH NO! I didn't forget about you, little worm. You'll be tiny down by my feet again soon enough. So don't even think about getting anyone to help you. But first..." Jones twists a knob on the gun and points it right at Professor Sato, smiling wickedly as she says "I think you'd be better suited a little bit shorter, Tomiko. Say... less than a quarter of an inch tall?" The terrified Japanese teacher stands paralyzed, shaking with fear as the evil woman proceeds to pull the trigger. Acting on instinct, you immediately spring into action, jumping in front of Professor Sato to shield her from the blast. As you leap through the air, you see Jones grin from ear to ear as a bright light emerges from the nozzle of the gun...
1233221.title: Jones Retakes Control

choices: She invites you out for dinner
She invites you back to her place!
She leans in for another kiss, but is interrupted.
12332213.content: From your spot mid-air, you wait for the effects to take place, but to your shock they don't. It seems like time slows to a crawl as you see the evil Brit's eyes go wide in surprise, as a blue light seems to leak out of the nozzle of the gun and surround her entire body. She lets out an ear piercing scream that quickly diminishes to a squeak, and then is inaudible. You land with a crash on the ground and Sato walks over to pick you up. "Are you okay?" You dust yourself off and go "Yeah I... i think so... what the hell happeened?" The cute asian teacher stands you up and reaches into her coat pocket, pulling out a small set of tweezers. "The gun is designed for gradual shrinkage over time. Shrinking you down to your previous size before was straining the system enough, and then she tried to increase the percentage of reduction to levels that haven't been tested yet. She overloaded the gun's servers and it backfired. I wanted to warn her that it would happen, but she pulled the trigger before i could. And now she's unbelievably tiny in the carpet. Do me a favor and don't move too much, I want to get her off the ground." You watch motionless as she grabs a magnifying glass from Jones' desk and slowly crouches down to search for the shrunken woman. "Agatha... come on out, little Aggie... i'm not gonna hurt you, even though rightfully i should..." You see the professor's eyes light up as she stifles a giggle and says "Are you really trying to run from me? Oh, that's adorable. I mean i can see why you'd be scared, i must look collosal to you... but you're just going to have to trust me." Sato reaches down quickly and with one grab, seizes the ridiculously small teacher in the tweezers. She keeps a hand under the instrument as she rises to her full height and brings her over towards you. "Well, what do you think we should do with her? I've got her life literally in the palm of my hand." You look over towards the hand and through the glass that Sato has held out for you, you can clearly see the quarter inch tall woman struggling and screaming in the grasp of the two metal pincers. You laugh at her plight and then look at the beautiful asian professor, saying "Well, we shouldn't hurt her. It's not right. But while she's that small, maybe you'd get some use out of her. Run some tests or something?" Sato's eyes light up and she says "Oh my god, that's right! She could be really helpful with my research like this! Okay, Aggie, hold still while i find something suitable to put you in." It doesn't take very long as she goes back to Jones's cluttered desk and grabs a small glass test tube, depositing the shrunken woman inside on the side so that she slides right to the bottom. The end of the glass is curved a bit, so you can see the tiny teacher struggling to stand up as she yells and beats her fists against the walls of the vial. Sato is holding the container between two of her fingers, smiling intensely as she makes fun of her new specimen. "For five years i've worked at this school, and since day one you've been impeding my work and belittling my efforts. Well, look who's the little one now? Once i show you to the school board, I'll have all the funding i need to put this place on the map. I'll run the entire department! And you'll just be my tiny little lab rat. You can see the tiny woman continue to scream in rage, until Sato simply shakes her hand from side to side, causing her to fall to her feet. Sato's expression changes from mock anger to real power as she says "By the way, i heard all the Asian jokes you were telling people behind my back. You're not a very nice person, Agatha Jones. And this is the last time you get ahead on my hard work." She asks you to hold the vial while she grabs some items from Jones's desk, and you hold it with one hand, looking down on the shrunken woman, who is fuming with anger. Using her free hands, Professor sato tapes over the top of the vial and pokes a small hole in the top for her to breath. She grabs the tube from you and puts it back in the set with the empty ones, labeling the side with a magic marker "PROJECT GULLIVER - EXPERIMENT 1". She carries the entire rack out and into her own office, and you follow her inside. She opens up her private safe behind her desk and places the rack of tubes inside. Before closing the door, Sato blows the tiny woman a kiss and says "Don't worry, Aggie. I'll be back later to give you some food and let you spread your legs a bit." You swear you could hear one last high pitched swear before Sato closes the hatch and locks it shut. You slowly approach her going "Professor Sato, are you okay?" She lets out a small laugh and looks you in the eyes saying "Please, I think we can know each other on a first name basis. Call me Tomiko." You smile and say back "Okay... Tomiko. Are you alright?" She sighs and says "I will be, thanks to you. I'm just happy the gun is out of that crazy bitch's hands." You laugh and say "I think everyone is. Even the people who don't know it happened." The professor bites her lip and stands right up next to you, almost blushing as she asks "Did you really jump in front of me to stop me from getting hit by the gun? Why would you do that for me?" You trail off and say "Oh I don't know... i just... didn't want you to get hurt, that's all." Tomiko grabs your chin with one hand and leans in, giving you a soft, gentle kiss on the cheek. She steps back with a a smile and says "My hero." She looks you up and down, and says "You're not all the way back to normal?" You snap out of your lovestruck daze and say "Uh, no. No i'm not. I'm a few inches shorter than normal. But i guess that's an easy fix, right?" The professor looks at the gun and then at you and says "Technically yes, but I'm kind of enjoying being the tall one. I'm usually so short. It's fun looking down on guys." She pats your head condescendingly, but smiles and says "But, i do feel like i should reward you for being such a good person. So..."
12332213.title: Jones is Taken Care of

choices: Wait in the room to be found
Venture out into the hallway!
1233222.content: You start to wave your hand and are just about to shout out Sato's name, when you are spun around and kicked in the balls by the shrunken professor! You fall to the ground in pain as she shouts at you, "Good luck surviving in my carpet you little shit! I'll be back to finish you off soon enough!" You collapse in agony as you see the professor dart towards the giant Japanese woman's foot, waving and screaming. The booming voice from above lets out a startled gasp before bending down to pick up the chubby British teacher now only inches tall at her feet. "AGATHA, WHAT HAPPENED? HOW DID YOU GET YOUR HANDS ON MY MACHINE?" You start to run towards the giant professor, when you hear the squeaks from Jones say "It was delivered to my office by mistake, i took it out of the packaging and it shot me! It's so scary down here, Tomiko! Change me back!" Professor Sato lowers a hand for her to climb on as you race to the scene. You don't make it in time, however and Jones' body is lifted off into the sky, carried in Sato's huge palm. Her deception has worked. As the Japanese skyscraper turns to leave, almost as a little jab against you, you hear Sato say "THANK GOD NOBODY ELSE WAS HURT BY MY DEVICE. NOW LET'S GET YOU BACK TO NORMAL!" You dropped to your knees as you saw the huge feet stomp out of the room. You were all alone, just a few inches tall, in the middle of that evil English bitch's office! What is your next plan of action?
1233222.title: Left Alone in the Carpet

choices: Teanna (She's doing some filing for Professor Sato)
Professor Montana (She's relaxing and reading a book)
Professor Sato (About to re-enlarge Jones!)
12332222.content: As the footsteps fade away, you realize that there's no use sitting around and waiting to be attacked by a bug or something! You decide to climb through the massive strands of carpet and make your way out to the hallway. As you move forward, all you can think about is stopping Professor Jones. Once she gets back to normal, you know without a doubt she's going to use the gun on the poor suspecting Professor Sato, probably killing her to get her out of the way. Then the whole world would feel the wrath of the psycho brit as she shrunk person after person. The thought of helping Sato was the only thing driving you out of the room and before you knew it, you were out into the middle of the hallway of the science building! You don't know how long the hall will be clear for, so you run as fast as you can into the next open door, where you can feel the tremors of giant footsteps. Which giant girl is in that room?
12332222.title: Venture out into the hallway!

choices: Stuck on Sato's lips
On one of Sato's breasts
Between Sato's Toes
12333.content: The glow of the ray stops, and you look up to see the Professor as an even more impressive giantess, but to your surprise she looks... more or less the same! She looks down at her hand with slight disappointment and says "WHAT? HAVE YOU GOTTEN ANY SMALLER? DAMNED THING MUST BE BRO.... AAAAAHHH!!" She looks up and lets loose a scream that almost shatters your eardrums. The hand you're in begins trembling and you try to hold onto the skin as tight as you can to get a clue of what's happened. When she finally stops shaking, you peek out over her fingertips and see nothing but a landscape of humongous fibers directly below you. The room you were in is now an endless open area with a seemingly unreachable sky. You've been shrunk again, while in the palm of Professor Jones' hand. And to make matters worse, you feel those familiar tremors. The steady footstep earthquakes of when a giant person is nearby. Only this time they are much, MUCH heavier. Professor Jones and you look at the door at the same time to see a humongous professor Tomiko Sato. She was your favorite teacher, and one of the heads of the physics department. She casually steps into the office you currently reside in, each footstep causing a slight heart attack as she gets closer and closer. You hear her loud deep voice say out loud with a force that could shatter the heavens "WHAT? MY INVENTION? WHAT IS IT DOING HERE" Jones whispers out to herself, echoing what you already know. "DEAR GOD, SHE'S SO BIG... AND I'M SO SMALL..." It's almost like she's forgotten that she has a shrunken person herself sitting in the middle of her hand, but everything she says just makes you feel even more insignificant. Because remember... as small as that person says she is, you are still an inch tall compared to her. "OH MY GOD, IS THAT REALLY WHAT I MUST HAVE LOOKED LIKE WHEN I SHRUNK THAT BOY! SHE'S ENORMO..." The professor stops herself midsentence and turns her attention back to you. A wicked grin comes across her face for the first time since she's been shrunk and she says "WHY, YOU'RE LITERALLY NOTHING NOW, AREN'T YOU? JUST A BUG WHEN COMPARED TO THE OTHER BUGS!" She's right. You're practically a walking talking germ resting in her palm. The chubby professor closes her fingers together to trap you as she runs over towards the humongous feet of professor Sato. She begins waving her arms around, tossing you to near concussions as you are rocketed between the skin of her fingers and palm. "TOMIKO! TOMIKO, I'M DOWN HERE! YOU STUPID JAPANESE TWAT!" For Jones' sake, all the giganic asian can hear are some slight squeaks coming from her feet. She looks down and immediately drops to a crouch to see better. "OH NO! AGATHA! YOU'RE... YOU'RE SO TINY!" Her voice is nothing short of deafening, even when you're ears are being muffled by Jones's skin which surrounds you on all sides. "I'M SO SORRY, AGGIE! LET ME PICK YOU UP!" As the god-like professor begins to bend down to rescue her co-worker, you start to feel a little bit relieved. That is until the hand you're standing on is lifted up to the grinning, evil face of Professor Jones. "DON'T THINK YOU'VE GOTTEN A FREE PASS HERE. REMEMBER, SHE JUST THINKS IT'S ME DOWN HERE." You feel the color drain from your face as you realize what she's saying to you. "I'LL AT LEAST HAVE A CHANCE AT GETTING BACK TO NORMAL. YOU ON THE OTHER HAND ARE GOING TO LIVE THE REST OF YOUR PATHETIC LIFE HERE IN MY CARPET!!" And to your horror, she puckers her lips together and blows you off of her palm. You are really in deep shit now, stuck at the size of a dust mite, floating around the room! A breeze rolls in from the window above Jones' desk, and you are so insignificant that you are tossed around by the small gust, flying across the room. You find yourself flying up into the air, miles and miles above the forest of carpet that lies below. Your insignificant form ends up coming closer and closer to the gargantuan form of Professor Sato. You brace yourself for landing, and find yourself...
12333.title: Microsized and Abandoned

choices: You fall off
Sato licks her lips
123331.content:
You sail in the air, at the pathetic size of 1 millimeter. Professor Sato is currently kneeling on the ground, talking to the tiny Professor Jones.

"OKAY, AGGIE, LET ME SET UP THE MACHINE AND GET YOU BACK TO THE RIGHT SCALE."

She stands up to her full height, and walks over to the machine. Unfortunately, she walks right into you, and you collide with her massive upper lip. You easily stick to the giant woman's lipstick, and are along for the ride. Sato quickly finishes a spare size device and is able to grow back both Jones and the original. They both hug, the massive women's voices damaging your ears.

"I'M GLAD YOU'RE OKAY, BE SURE NOT TO TOUCH ANYTHING IN HERE."

"OH BELIEVE ME, I THINK I'VE GOTTEN MY FILL FROM THIS ROOM."

Jones glances at Sato's lips and notices your squirming figure. She holds in a giggle, and Sato notices.

"WHAT'S SO FUNNY?"

"OH, NOTHING, I JUST REMEMBERED SOMETHING FROM EARLIER. I'LL SEE YOU LATER."

And with that, Professor Jones left the lab. Sato sighs to herself, washing your body with a hurricane of breath. She continues working in the lab on miscellaneous objects. As she tinkers with the shrink ray, you feel yourself loosening from the sticky lipstick. As you begin to peel off her lips...
123331.title: Stuck on Sato's lips

choices: Her cleavage
The edge of her breast
1233311.content: You free fall down the cliff that is Sato's chin, with her bust appearing below you. It wasn't huge, but even then they were the size of office buildings to you. You bounce off her chest, and begin rolling towards...
1233311.title: You fall off

choices: Growth (1 cm)
Shrink (1/10 mm)
12333112.content:
You tumble off her breast and end up in free fall yet again. Below you lays a massive workbench. Suddenly, Sato moves her arm and sends you flying. You land hard on a cold metal surface and pass out.

When you wake up, you look about in confusion. You're on some platform, with a familiar looking tube resting above you. Behind you is a massive metal disk, standing twice as high as you are. You climb on top and realize it's a quarter! And that tube is the barrel of the shrink ray! That's when you notice Sato in the distance, goggles on and a remote in her hands. She has a gleeful smile on her face as she hits the button, and a green beam envelops you and the coin. She managed to decrease the power to grow/shrink by 10 times, but which happens?

choices: She notices you
A lab assistant distracts her
123331122.content: Everything around you explodes in height again as you and the quarter shrink down. You hear a massive squeal echo from the heavens as Professor Sato celebrates the test. Suddenly, a pair of massive metal blocks approach. They straddle both sides of the coin, and lift it and you in the air. You hang on for dear life as the tweezers swing you over a massive plain of glass. Above you rests the massive lens of a microscope. Now's your chance, you'll finally be rescued! Professor's titanic form settles down, and sets up the microscope. A blinding light shines from beneath you, but you only care about the enormous eye above you. You frantically jump around as the lens focuses in view. Sato finally gets the settings right when...
123331122.title: Shrink (1/10 mm)

choices: SHOULD GROW YOU BACK."
SHOULD TRY SOME TESTS WHILE I HAVE A SUBJECT."
1233311221.content:
The sky-filling eye sweeps about, before locking on you. The pupil dilates, as a roaring gasp blows your eardrums. The eye disappears for a moment, then returns and gazes carefully. You get blasted by a hurricane-force sigh as a heavenly voice roars:

"I DON"T BELIEVE IT, SOMEONE ELSE GOT SHRUNK? WELL, GUESS I...
1233311221.title: She notices you

choices: Dr. Sato's lab coat
The floor
1233311222.content:
A booming click echoes in the distance, as another massive being enters the room. At the sound of the door opening, the enormous eye leaves the lens and Sato spins about to greet the person. As you panic and wave your arms even harder, the newcomer speaks:

"DR. SATO? WE HAD AN ACCIDENT IN THE CHEMICAL STATION. WE'RE ALREADY CLEANING IT UP, BUT YOU SHOULD PROBABLY COME CHECK IT OUT."

Dr. Sato gives out a hurricane-force sigh as she replies:

"OK, I'LL COME TAKE A LOOK."

And with that, the miles-tall giantess switches off the microscope and turns about to stand up. As she does, she creates an air current that sweeps you off the quarter. You fly in the air, and land on...
1233311222.title: There's always a distraction

choices: You land in her pocket
You splash down in the chemicals
12333112221.content:
A wall of white grows closer by the second. The uniform coloring gives way to reveal it's a field of cross-crossing cables, each about a foot wide to you. You slam into the enormous structure, and hang on for dear life. Below you is a pit made of the same material: her front pocket. You bounce about as Professor Sato heads towards another room.

As she enters, she notices the smashed flasks on the ground, and a small puddle of green goop. The students were doing well, though, as they had cut of its flow with the emergency bag of kitty litter. She leans over the puddle at a safe distance, and tries to read the flask labels to get an idea of what the cocktail of chemicals is.

Meanwhile, that simple lean has compromised your hold, and you are falling towards what looks like an ocean of green goop. However, that pocket might be able to save you from whatever is down there.
12333112221.title: Dr. Sato's lab coat

choices: Take the chance
Stay safe
123331122211.content:
The mouth of the white cavern zooms past as you land on the wall, still sliding towards the bottom. You finally reach the end, and slam into a house-sized piece of lint. Above you, the godlike voice of the professor reverberates through your hiding place.

"WELL DONE ON THE CLEANUP, LOOKS LIKE I'LL JUST NEED TO FILE THE INCIDENT REPORT."

Your world continues to bounce about as Sato seems to be walking about. A shadow appears overhead, and a massive black pillar lands in the pocket. The tip is an enormous ball covered in ink: it's a pen! Maybe you can catch a ride out of here and get Sato's attention!
123331122211.title: You land in her pocket

choices: You survive
The pen crushes you
1233311222111.content:
As Sato continues walking, you climb up the pocket wall and leap onto the rubber grip, grabbing onto a small crack. As you cling to the monolithic pen, Sato's hand effortlessly lifts the pillar in the air. The floor beneath you opens up to a massive desk, with numerous sheets of paper lying about. The mile-long fingers shift position, and shove you off the pen, and towards the desk below. As you approach the white plain, you see you are landing right inside the signature box. You hit the ground, but manage to survive the fall.

A rush of wind sends you prone as Sato moves the pen to the top of the form, and begins writing. To you, however, it's like watching a mountain etch a canyon into the white landscape, depositing a black goop behind it. You run away from the catastrophic event happening at the top of the page. Escape is difficult, as Sato's wrist movement constantly knows you over. You only cover a centimeter and just reach a massive black line as the pen moves to your right! The mountain carves its way towards you, do you escape?
1233311222111.title: Escaping the pocket

choices: The sandwich
The glass
12333112221111.content: You scream in horror as the pen approaches...and loops around you. The pen lifts in the air, and it drops next to the paper. The nightmare is over...or so you thought. Finished with the report, Professor Sato picks up the paper, knocking you over. She, of course, is unaware of your location, and so doesn't care as she carries the paper vertically. You hang onto the edge of a valley made from the pen, with a miles-long drop underneath you. You see papers, pens, and other objects move underneath you. You see a plate with a sandwich, and a clear glass. The hand holding the report shakes ever so slightly, but that's enough for you to lose your grip. As you plummet, Sato walks away. What do you land on?
12333112221111.title: You survive

choices: You get lucky and land on her lips
Down the gullet
123331122211112.content: A glassy lake of water becomes your landing zone. You dive in with a microscopic *plop*, and surface. If the world was hard to see as a dust speck, it's even harder through the glass. You take a couple minutes to swim to the side of the glass, but the wall is too smooth, even at your size. Suddenly, the liquid starts to ripple as someone enters the room. The continental mass that you can only assume is Sato takes a seat and grabs a beige block, lifting it to her head. With a tearing noise, she takes a bite of the sandwich, rendering horrific destruction to a city-sized chunk. She continues to tear apart the meal, unaware of her audience. After a moment, a pink mass reaches for the glass and lifts you up. The sky above you is replaced with the terrifying visage of pink lips that could swallow any building with ease. They open, and the liquid under you begins to flow towards the maw. You have no hope of fighting the current as you drift nearer to your doom.
123331122211112.title: The glass

choices: Start climbing.
Slip and fall...on her tongue!
1233311222111121.content:
An absolutely minuscule wave crests right on Dr. Sato's lips before getting sucked into her mouth. For you, that splash was a tidal wave that tossed you up onto a red landscape. This place is familiar to you, but last time you were about 10 times larger. Before, you were able to break free of the sticky lipstick, but now you're so small you can even pry an arm free. You can only lay there as a flood sweeps underneath you.

On second thought, you're glad the lipstick has you stuck so well.

After a moment, the glass recedes, leaving you behind. A gust of wind blows from above, before another equally powerful gale sucks in as Dr. Sato breathes. This cataclysmic event repeats again, and again. Meanwhile, beneath you a field of bread approaches, and you feel the ground shift as her mouth opens up. A chill goes up your spine as teeth a hundred times larger than you tear into the sandwich, mashing it to bits. With her next bite, a drop of mayo flies out and on you. The chewing stops as a muscular wall emerges, sweeping over her lips. The extra moisture partially dissolves her lipstick by the tiniest amount, breaking you free. As the tongue recedes, your bonds break and you...
1233311222111121.title: Deja Vu

choices: Inside her nostril!
On the bridge of her nose!
12333112221111211.content: With your newfound freedom, you quickly scale the lips of the enormous professor. All the while, the sounds of her chewing and breathing blast you. As you get closer to her nose, the gales grow stronger and stronger. Suddenly she sniffs, yanking you free of her skin and landing...
12333112221111211.title: Start climbing.

choices: ...sniffed up
...stay in the nasal cavity
123331122211112111.content:
The powerful suction of her breathing is enough to completely yank you from the soft ground and hurl you through the air. You're sucked up into Sato's left nostril, disappearing into the giant dark cavern as the lovely professor continues to eat her lunch.

You impact hard with something sticky and take a moment to gain your bearings. It was dark, warm and loud. "Woah... I'm inside Sato's body..." you say aloud, wandering along the fleshy floor of her nasal passage. "This is incredible..."

As you continue your microscopic adventure, Sato takes another deep breath and you are suddenly swept off your feet once more...
123331122211112111.title: Into Sato You Go

choices: Leave it at the lab
Bring it home
1233311222112.content: While getting noticed is your number two priority, survival is first. Jumping onto a pen does not sound like the best way to get Sato's attention. You watch as Sato takes the pillar out of her pocket, and causes more rumbling as she writes something down. The next few hours are uneventful, other than the incessant earthquakes caused by every movement from the giantess. 12333112221221.content:
You sigh in defeat as the world around you shrinks once again. The distance to everything around you multiplies once again, as you find yourself at the pitiful size of 10 micrometers. You'd be dwarfed by...well, everything. At this size you're completely invisible to the naked eye: your only chance at rescue is to get to a microscope and hope Professor Sato or her assistants use it. Speaking of Sato...

The Asian professor sighs as she puts together the ingredient list. It's a jumble of organic compounds that will attack any cells, but leave everything else alone. Right on cue, a pair of lackeys arrive with more bags of kitty litter. Ripping the open, she and her assistants pour the absorbant particles all over the spill, until the liquid is completely absorbed. Using a shovel, they scoop clump after clump into waste bags, to be tossed out and safely disposed of. Occasionally, a few bits miss the bag and land on the floor. After the big mess is bagged, Sato calls the janitor in to finish cleaning up, and heads to her office.

Far, far off in the distance, beyond the ocean of goop and the kitty litter shore, stood two enormous black monoliths. The two high heels rise 30 miles into the air, before they are replaced by two brown pillars of fabric. Those in turn transition to a teal top and a white lab coat, all sitting hundreds of miles above you. In the distance, the thundering booms of footsteps grow closer. The monument above you turns about, creating shockwaves that become massive waves in the spill. You see two more figures enter the room, carrying large bags. A ripping noise fills the air, and you watch as all three giants stand over the spill, pouring the contents over you. Massive boulders, ranging from the size of a shack to an office building, rain down on you. Each particle lands with a splash, knocking you about. After a moment, the grains start to clump together, trapping you inside. You the sound of pouring cease, only to be replaced with a scraping noise. You can't see what is causing it, being stuck in a layer of wet particles. Suddenly, your view is replaced with a wall of metal, and you feel gravity shift around you. As the boulders fall and break apart, you finally get free of your prison, only to see an orange abyss you are helplessly sliding towards. Out of nowhere, a massive boulder careens past you, knocking you out to the side amidst a few stray pieces. You plummet for miles before landing on the unending surface that is the lab floor. A few miles away stood the black heels of Sato, even more intimidating at this distance. You start running, hoping to catch a ride. Above, you can hear thunderous sounds leave her mouth, but you can't understand them. You do understand what a man in blue clothing and holding a white object means. You push yourself even harder, hoping to reach Sato's heel before she moves and leaves you at the mercy of an unaware janitor.

Do you make it?

Because of your small size, you leap instead of run toward the high heel, probably your last hope at rescue. With one final leap, you grab hold of the monolithic heel just as it begins to rise. Each step of the city-sized foot causes an earthquake that rattles you to your core, but you've found a tiny hole to stay in for now.

Sato arrives at her office, and takes a seat. Her feet were killing her, high heels always wore her out. She swings her feet up onto the desk, and leans back into her chair. Her arms stretch into the air as she yawns, feeling a nap come on.

Your ride has come to an end, with a 2 mile drop down to the desk. You figure you can survive it, and jump. You land on a massive sheet of paper, likely another form to fill out. You shudder as you recall the last time you were on a form, but as Sato yawns you sigh in relief; she won't be touching this one for a while. Looking around, there appears to be plenty of electronics around. Maybe there's a...there! A small microscope was placed right beside her monitor. If you can reach that, you're golden. THe next time she uses it, you can jump out and call for help. Reinvigorated with hope, you set out on your expedition.

An hour passes, and you've managed to travel to her keyboard. Sato has remained asleep, but you know she's due to wake up at any moment. Sure enough, the goddess does, and sits up straight. She looks at her watch and exclaims:

1233311222122221.content:
You tried to fight the cruel forces of nature, like gravity and such, but to no awail: as soon as you fell into sea-sized spill, your head quickly sank down, no matter how you tried to avoid that. Thankfully for you, the currents in a paddle quickly waved you out, but no sooner before you lost your conscious.
After a somewhat two or three minutes of being trapped in a dark, muffed place that was just you losing senses, you finally started to feel yourself better. Huge unforgivable grip of darkness slowly faded away, and you finally leant on your arm to give yourself a little help to get up, despite the temptation to just lie down and rest.
It was a moment when you felt the beat inside your chest. No, your heart didn’t pop out as you feared, and even with all adrenaline pumping through your veins, you felt more than okay. Yes, you felt your heart thumping like mad like after hours of nonstop jogging, but it wasn’t that bothered you most.
In fact, you were surprised how loud your heart was. How powerful its thumps were. How it echoed in your ears.
You forgot your shrunken state for a minute and decided to examine yourself. You slowly opened your eyes...
First thing you saw was a slab of meat on your breast. No; it was double slabs of meat, pecs, on your chest. It was hard to believe what you saw, but a test - a simple touch - proved you wrong. These slabs were for real, and they did belonged to your body. Yet, you didn’t recall this place of your body to be so tense and big and... hard.
Then, you saw your arm and you instantly screamed in a scare: your arm had grown several massive bulges of, what you guessed moments later, muscles. Rock-hard bulges of muscles, you felt as you tried to squeeze your bicep; your other arm transformed in the same way. Adding that, you realised that not only your biceps and triceps and whatsoever changed: the arm didn’t look like a thin twig it was this morning, but rather a tree trunk; that’s how thick it was, even without bulging muscles - and whatelse muscles there were, they also were buffed, swelling out your arm even more.
Next thing your gaze laid upon were your legs; scratch your arms being tree trunk; legs took that title. So thick and so wide, it made you wonder why they weren’t touching each other. Even the smallest motion made them radiate with the power within them; and that was them not even tensed a bit!
You found it out when you actually tried to stand up: that’s when they swelled outwards. Boy, you thought, you could certainly kick the ball in a soccer game and break a gate with the sheer force.
It didn’t make a great surprise to find out that your torso swelled with muscles too; the thought that there could be an eighth pack of abs never stumbled upon your mind, yet there it was - just above your abdomen and not as noticeably huge as its twin brothers way up. Those were simply big and hard.
Your spine creaked several times by the time you finally stood up; what it was, you had no idea, but it did felt good. You tried to look at your back, and had serious troubles looking firstly past your muscle-inflated shoulders and shoulderblades; but it was safe to assume that your back got its part of upgrade.
It was then when you felt something odd between your legs. At first, it felt like an additional weight hanging down from your dick; a quick check proved that it WAS your dick. A thick, long meat of a manhood hanged down, astonishing you with its own girth - slightly wider than your hand was before - and length, smacking heavily across your thighs and just coming two thirds way to your knee.
And it was, to your surprise, flaccid. What will become with this when it turns hard...
Just then, you felt a slight shake. A slight tremor. You quickly turned around, looking for a source of shakes, when you realised that, surprisingly, the source was somewhere between your... legs.
It didn’t took really long to find out what it was. Your ballsac, your balls swelled to a size that it actually felt tight between your legs. Just to be sure, you stretched hand to grab it and gasped in shock: your palm wasn’t enough to grab it. It was simply bigger than your palm. And it was already swelling outwards, slowly, but surely. It wasn’t growing; it was filling with your seed!
And the world did seemed a little bit smaller than it was before; but you reckon that it was just your body getting bigger from growing muscles, not an effect of a size ray or something. You are still a grain of sand, a speck, and this size, all these muscles are not so impressive. Like it is said, an ant is able to lift up a weight hundreds of his own, and everybody is able to lift up hundreds of ants, but right now, you weren’t able to do either of those.
Just as you finished examining changes that left you with a body, none for short, of an ancient athlete of Greek myths - heck, maybe you could start comparing yourself with Incredible Hulk - a real shake happened. A real tremor. A tremor of all tremors, throwing you around and back on the spill, but your mass wasn’t enough to break surface tension and the liquid behaved like a huge trampoline, throwing you back...
A huge pillar of a heel and a boot descended from a sky with an earthshattering force. A reasonably strong gust of wind made its way to the trembling spill, but you managed to hold on the ground.
As for you, you really hoped that it was Professor Sato. It wouldn’t help you much since she wouldn’t be able to see you, but to see a friendly face was enough to calm down. Unfortunately, you couldn’t see who it was: face of a ruthless giant was too high to see it clearly, and the voice was so distorted that you couldn’t recognise it. But what you saw and heard clearly was something resembling hand coming from above with a huge grey material in it, and it was coming down fast!
Not that you could run away to fast to dodge it...
