1241212.content:
The obviously distraught girl starts mumbling to herself in spanish, and Bayley raises an eyebrow at her. "I'm sorry, can we get a translation? I don't think that means "thank you"." The cleaning lady is reasonably angry at Bayley, and with her eyes squinted in anger, she shouts "I SAID YOU'RE A FUCKING BITCH! How could you do that you crazy cu...." Before she can finish, a familiar light flashes throughout the room, and standing in place of the recently restored woman stands a doll once again. She screams just as loud as she did the first time in her shrunken, high pitched voice, but it seems even more faint and pathetic than before. You think Bayley may have knocked another few inches off of her previous size, just because. Almost as if she's ignoring her own actions, Bayley looks back at you and says very arrogantly "My, she has such an attitude. But i guess she really wanted to be turned back into a teeny little Mexi-mouse, didn't she?" You don't say anything, you're too stunned by her actions and scared by how comfortable she is taking away someone's size like that as a gag.

The confident smirk on Bayley's face is nothing short of chilling as she lightly taps her foot in front of the once-again shrunken maid. "You know, I think i know what your problem was. Instead of making you big again, i should have turned this switch here..." She turns a dial all the way down to the lowest setting and points the gun at the small woman, before finishing "And made you even smaller. You could have been a person. Now you'll be a speck." You hear a high pitched cry as the shrunken woman begins to run away from her giant captor. You see Bayley go to move her foot over her hispanic prey and you shout out "Okay, that's enough! Stop torturing her!" The dominant girl raises an eyebrow and matter of factly states "Torture? I'm not torturing. I'm punishing. She should learn not to use such foul language in front of someone who can crush them under her pinkie." You slowly walk over in front of Bayley and bend down to pick up the shivering girl off of the floor. She holds her arms up over her head in a meaningless attempt to get you not to grab her, but you are sure to be gentle as you lift her up with your thumb and forefinger. Using your other palm as a base, you rest her down gently, marvelling at just how light and cute she looks gazing up at you from your hand. You turn your attention back to Bayley and start scolding her. "Look at her! She must be scared out of her whits! You took this way too far and need to make it right."

Bayley rolls her eyes as you slowly move your hand down to a table and let the shrunken girl hop off. She looks up at you and you can almost see a hint of a smile as you move your hand away from her, leaving her exposed on the tabletop. Turning to your equally sized friend one more time, you fold your arms and say "Now, Bayley. Turn that gun to the right setting, and make her normal sized." You can tell that she is nowhere near pleased with you as she scoffs and angrily readjusts the gun. You cross your arms and lean against the desk, facing the spoiled brat with the world's most powerful invention and say "Go ahead. Do it." Bayley points the gun at the desk and looks at both you and the shrunken maid, almost as if she's trying to decide exactly what to do next. That's when she says...
1241212.title: Should have kept her little mouth shut...

choices: "Thank you again, mister."  She gives you the gun back and just leaves.
"Can you please make me bigger again?"  She asks you to shoot her.
"I'm sorry, But nobody can know I did this."  She shrinks you down to tiny size!
1241213.content: Bayley tries to hold back laughter as she cranes her neck down to look the little cleaning lady in the eyes. "Look I'm... sorry or whatever. What's your name, little girl?" The slightly shorter Mexican girl lets out a sigh of frustration and says "My name is Maria. Please make me big like normal again?" Bayley puts a finger to her chin in mock thought and says "Nah, I kind of like you this way. You should be glad I made you any bigger at all. In fact, why don't I make you just a little smaller so you get the message?" Bayley smirks as she raises the gun again, this time holding it up to the short Mexican girl's chest. You are about to object, when suddenly Maria springs into action, grabbing the gun with both hands and kicking Bayley in the shins, dropping her to her knees. She holds her leg in pain, but looks up only to find Maria smiling and holding the size ray. Bayley's face immediately goes white as she says "Now.. now hold on. Don't do anything stupid! I was just joking!" Maria points the gun at Bayley and says "No. You are a bad, bad girl. And bad girls get punished!" She shoots the gun right at the girl on the ground, who screams as she quickly dwindles down to no more than an inch tall. She scrambles around on the floor, trying to hide behind the legs of the oversized chair she was shrunk next to, but Maria simply bends down and in one swift motion, grabs the tiny girl between her thumb and forefinger. Holding her up to her tanned face, Maria yells at the shrunken girl "You wanted to make me a doll? Now you are the doll! And i am going to have fun playing with you!" Bayley screams in fear from between the pretty cleaning lady's fingers, but her screams are silenced quickly as Maria takes off one of her high heeled shoes and holds it up in the air. "You are going to stay here, stupid girl! It's not very big of a shoe, but that is your own fault!" The tiny girl screams and cries some more as she is dropped into the warm, smelly shoe, joined shortly by the Mexican girl's huge toes! It's almost poetic, you think to yourself, seeing Bayley get turned into a toy herself. You go up to Maria and grab her shoulder. "Are you okay?", you ask her as she spins around. She smiles and pulls down your face to give you a kiss on the cheek. "You saved me!" She says as she goes to pick up the gun and says to you...
1241213.title: Turnabout!

choices: Purse
Panties
12412133.content: "I'm sorry, but nobody can know I did this." Maria said pointing the gun at you. "But I just saved you." you said. "I know." she said. "But I can't risk you telling anyone about shrinking her." You couldn't believe your ears, you just saved this girl from Becky and now she was going to shrink you too. "Besides." Maria said. "You can be my little boy toy and I'll take good care of you." Maria pulled the trigger and you were hit with the green beam and were shrunk to about an inch tall like Becky. You looked up at the Latina goddess standing and looking down with a cute and evil smile. "Ok little man." Maria said reaching down to pinch you with two finger nails. "Your going to ride in my...
12412133.title: "I'm sorry, But nobody can know I did t...

choices: She screams in horror and runs out of the room
She bends down and tries to carefully pick you up
She smirks and traps you under her foot
1242.content: You can see that Bayley is worried so you sigh and say "Well, if you don't want to go first, i guess i'll have to. Just... stand back, okay?" Without saying another word, you put the gun up to your chest and pull the trigger. The feeling of shrinking is a unique one, you feel like a million jolts of energy are running through your body at once as you feel the room expanding around you. Also expanding near you is Bayley, who's eyes have widened to just about their maximum level, as she watches her classmate dwindel in front of her. You feel the gun you're holding get heavier and heavier, as well as your clothes getting looser and looser. You realize to your shock that your body is shrinking, but nothing else is! You drop the gun to the ground and fit the clothing around your body as you shrink, allowing yourself to fall into the neckhole of your tshirt. Bayley just bends over your body until you become nothing more than a 5 inch tall replica of yourself, standing in an oversized pile of clothes! You look up at the now gigantic girl and shout up as loud as you can "Well, what do you think?"
1242.title: Shrinking for Bayley

choices: "...show you to someone."
"...keep you."
12422.content: "Oh my god ", Bayley exclaims. "You're so tiny and cute." You are a bit embarrassed, but you still go with it. "What now ", you finally ask her after a brief moment of silence. "Well", replies Bayley. "I could..."
12422.title: She bends down and tries to carefully pick you up

choices: "Hell no! Change me back now!"
Well, she is kinda cute, and she seems really nice.
124222.content:
"I could keep you", Bayley replied. "What", you scream. "Like, as a pet!?" "No, not like that", she reassures. "As a cute little friend. I don't have very many friends, and you're really cute, so, yeah."

What is your decision?
124222.title: "...keep you."

choices: Professor Sato!
Professor Montana!
Professor Jones!
1243.content: You say "Alright, now just hold still, this shouldn't hurt at all..." Bayley stands up straight and tries to be brave, but when you're about to pull the trigger, she runs towards you with her arms outstretched saying "I... I can't do it! Don't shoot me!" You've already pulled the trigger and the beam has struck Bayley, but before she begins shrinking, she latches onto you and hugs you, allowing the green beam to cover not only Bayley but you as well! You feel yourself falling to the floor as Bayley latches onto you for dear life screaming. When she finally calms down, she slowly lifts herself off of you, but immediately covers her mouth in terror as she has a look around. You follow suit, and your mouth jars open as you see that you and your friend have been shrunk down to only about an inch tall! You turn around to try and comfort Bayley saying "It's gonna be okay. We'll just get back to normal... Where's the gun?" the girl's face remains pale with her eyes wide as she slowly lifts her hand up and points behind you. Following her pointing finger, you almost break down yourself. The gun is directly in front of you, but it's at normal size. There's no way the two of you would be able to operate it. Bayley sits down and starts rubbing her hands together, saying "We're small... so small... like bugs... nobody's gonna find us, they might step on us... nothing but bugs..." You go to comfort her but a sound makes you spin around quickly. As much as you don't want to admit it, she may be onto something. The door has now swung open, and a humongous figure has made their way into the room. You grab Bayley by the hand and run with her underneath the desk you were standing in front of, hiding behind one of the table's gigantic legs. The booming steps around you frighten your shrunken partner even more, and you hug her close to try and keep her from fainting. You peak around the corner of your hiding space and see two enormous open-toed shoes. Following your vision up the huge legs and up to the face of the giant, you see who's just made their way into the office...
1243.title: Both of you go down

choices: "LET'S GET YOU TWO BACK TO NORMAL RIGHT NOW!"
"THE GUN NEEDS TO RECHARGE FOR A FEW HOURS... SO I'LL TAKE YOU HOME WITH ME!"
"WELL... AS OF RIGHT NOW THE RAY'S EFFECTS ARE... IRREVERSIBLE."
12431.content:
"WHAT THE HELL IS MY INVENTION DOING HERE?!" You hear the booming scream of Professor Sato as she stomps over towards the gigantic ray gun, picking it up to inspect it. "NOTHING SEEMS TO BE WRONG WITH IT. I'D BETTER LOOK IT OVER FOR A SECOND, MAKE SURE IT WASN'T TAMPERED WITH." This is great! Not only are you sure that Professor Sato knows EVERYTHING about the gun, but she's going to be there for a few minutes! Now's your chance, so you grab Bayley and head towards the Asian Professor's humongous feet. "What are you doing? She'll crush us without even knowing it!" Bayley tries to hold you back but you reassure her by pointing at her open toe'd shoes. "The Professor knows all about the shrinking technology, i'm sure she's not going to carelessly step around while the gun's in this room. If we climb up onto her foot and get her attention, maybe she'll be able to change us back!" You and Professor Sato had a good relationship, so you had no problem rushing into this plan. You knew that there would be no hidden motives or mistakes, like with Professor Jones. She's always been a bitch to Sato and pretty much every other professor. You know if she had control of the gun, there'd be trouble for the campus. But you put that aside as you and Bayley reach the Professor's giant feet.

You go close to the nearest one and climb up in between her Big and second toe, helping Bayley do the same. "Wow, it's so warm here", Becky says. You agreed, the professor's feet were giving off a lot of body heat, and they smelled like a nice mixture of sweat and lotion. You had always appreciated her feet, so you couldn't help but feel that it was sort of exciting. But you knew you had to get her attention quick so you jumped up onto her big toe and slammed your fists against the hard nail repeatedly. Eventually you heard a "HMMM?" escape from the gargantuan Japanese woman, and you knew your plan had succeeded. Becky was quivering in between the professor's toes saying "Please don't let her think we're bugs... please let us get out of here alive!" You weren't really nervous until you heard Bayley's plea, and saw Professor Sato bend down to inspect her feet. She readjusted her glasses and gave a confused look at her feet saying "WHAT THE... OH!" She quickly looked back at the gun and then back to her feet as the realization swept over her. "OH MY GOD, YOU MUST BE SO FRIGHTENED! DON'T WORRY, LITTLE PERSON... JUST CLIMB DOWN ONTO THE SHOE!" You jump off the skin of her big toe and land next to Bayley who hugs you out of happiness. The massive foot slides out of the shoe and it is awe inspiring watching that huge of a foot move so quickly. You and your fellow shrunken traveller are lifted into the air as Sato has picked up the shoe and held it at eye level. She recognizes you and lets out a small, muffled scream. "BAYLEY? GOOD LORD, YOU MUST BE TERRIFIED IN MY SHOE LIKE THAT, AND ... OH MY, THERE'S MORE OF YOU! I'M SO SORRY FOR THIS TO HAVE HAPPENED TO YOU TWO! MY TEACHING AID AND MY STAR PUPIL REDUCED TO A FRACTION OF THEIR SIZE AT MY TOES! IT MUST HAVE BEEN SO SCARY FOR YOU!"

She keeps her other hand steady next to the shoe, inviting you two to climb on. You and Bayley both dare to cross the gap between the shoe and her warm, waiting palm, and walk towards the center of it for safety. Sato holds the hand up close to her face and her pretty glasses-framed eyes stare down at you with relief. "I'VE GOT YOU TWO... YOU'RE SAFE HERE IN MY HAND." You and Bayley finally had a moment of relief to look around and appreciate how amazing it was being just an inch tall. The lines in Sato's hand were remarkably noticable, her fingers stretched up far into the sky from their base at your feet, and her gorgeous reassuring face was hovering overhead, smiling. Bayley shouted up at the professor "This is great and all, but when can you change us back?" The Professor replied...
12431.title: Getting Sato's Attention

choices: You both fly off
You stay on her toes and are noticed!
You stay on her toes, but go unnoticed!
12432.content: The hot (but admittedly clumsy) redhead was standing over the table in the lab looking for the papers she needed to grade during her free period. She doesn't even notice the big shrink ray at her feet, she's so absent minded. You realized she'd be busy for a few minutes, which gives you a window of opportunity to grab her attention! You and Bayley both run to the huge open-toed shoes and climb up to her feet. "God, her feet smell so awful! Does she ever wash!" You smelled it too, but in a weird way, you thought it was kind of sexy. Best not let Bayley know that though, just continue on with trying to get noticed. You bang on the hard nail of her big toe, but it's no use. The skin is just too thick, and your small hands aren't causing enough of an impact to get her to notice you. You look at the shrunken girl next to you, who's done something a little more drastic... she's slid underneath her toes! "Bayley! Get the hell out of there! She could crush you without even trying!" Bayley slides under some more and says "Don't worry, i have an idea! This will get her to notice us for sure! Just hold on to something!" Bayley positions herself underneath Professor Montana's second and third toes, and begins thrashing around, rubbing against the softs skin of her sole! To your shock, the professor not only notices this, but starts laughing pretty hard "WHA... WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON DOWN THERE HAHA! IS THERE A BUG ON MY SHOE OR SOMETHIN.. AHAHAHA!" Bayley escapes the giant toes just in time as they start wiggling in reaction to being tickled. Maybe Bayley had a good point with this, and you'll be saved! But you realize that the foot is moving around too much, and you're being tossed and turned between the giant teacher's toes! Are you able to hold on with all of her commotion?
12432.title: The Ticklish Giantess

choices: Vari, the Indian teacher's pet
Elsa, the German Exchange Student.
Somebody else
125.content: Teanna goes towards the back and says "Let me see if there's another professor here who can help you!" She makes her way off to the back and you sit in the chair, waiting for her to come back. while you wait, you decide to take out the gun and look at it a bit. It's amazing that something like that could possibly be made by a professor at your school. While you're studying it, you don't notice somebody coming right up next to you until you hear them say "What the hell is that?" You look up and see..
125.title: A Student, perhaps?

choices: Picks you up to put in her pocket!
Sits on you in the chair!
Shrinks you again and puts you on the ground!
1251.content: You looked up to see the inquisitive face of one Vari Patel. Vari was the biggest brown nosing student you've ever had a class with. She was a fairly attractive young indian girl, but she was a total know-it-all and cocky to boot, always having to be the smartest person in every class she was in. She repeats herself as you have lost your place in thought "I SAID, what do you have there in your hands?" You stammer a response of "Oh, it's, uh... it's nothing. Just something i wanted the professor to look at." The thin indian girl brushed her hair to the side as she scoffed "I could probably tell you what it is. Some of the teachers here are really not that smart after all. Let me see it, please!" Despite her "please" she roughly grabbed the gun and began inspecting it. "It seems to be some sort of laser. You can tell by the burn marks in the side panels to release excess heat. But why do you have it?" You explain to her that you had it delivered to your place and she lets out a disgusted laugh saying "Why would somebody like you be a priority to hold something like this? They should have sent it to me, if they thought it was of high importance. Granted, it's not like it's powerful enough to hurt you, the fuel cells are too small to cause any sort of damaging heat. You should just feel a tingle if i were to shoot you like this." Oh boy. You try to object, but Vari pulls the trigger, causing the familiar green light to shoot out and envelope your whole body. Teanna's jaw drops as she watches her friend shrink down in the chair next to her desk. The Indian girl who did this to you however, looks at the gun and then back at you, before a cruel smirk crosses her lips. Vari's big brown eyes light up at the sight of you shrinking down in your chair and when you get to about two feet tall, you try to escape, only for Vari to use one of her massive arms to push you back into the seat. "OH MY GOODNESS! IT SEEMS YOU ARE NOT THE BIG MAN OF CAMPUS ANYMORE, ARE YOU? WITH EVERY SECOND YOU GET SMALLER AND SMALLER!" You can only look up as Vari looks down at you with pure delight, watching you shrink down to a very tiny size in your chair. You looked over to the desk and saw Teanna desperately trying to dial the phone to get security, when Vari turns her gaze to your friend. "OH NO YOU DON'T, SILLY GIRL! YOU WILL BE SMALL TOO!" Vari spins around with the gun and blasts Teanna, causing her to scream for a second before dwindling down herself. You can't see her anymore because of the desk in the way, and instead turn your attention back to the giant Indian girl who's reduced you in the first place. She merely looks at you and places a massive brown finger directly on your chest, keeping you in place as you shrink down to your final size of two inches. You are powerless to stop the crazy foreign girl as she brushes her hair out of her face and says down to your miniscule body "NOW, WHAT AM I GOING TO DO WITH YOU?"
1251.title: Vari has the gun!

choices: "MAKE YOU MY NEW LITTLE PET!"
"PLAY WITH YOU... AND THIS GUN!"
"GIVE YOU TO MY LITTLE SISTER AS A TOY!"
12511.content: "NOW STAY STILL! I DON'T WANT TO DAMAGE YOUR TINY BODY ON THE WAY HOME!" Home? What is she talking about? You run to the edge of the chair but the drop in height is just too much... you are trapped. You spin around to see a cute brown-skinned face hovering over you, grinning maliciously. "YOU THOUGHT YOU COULD ESCAPE FROM ME? THAT IS SO CUTE." Her condescending words wrap around you, much like her massive hand which has reached down to you and trapped you in a hot, tight fist. You hear giggling all around you as you are released from your prison suddenly, falling what seems like hundreds of feet down. You scream all the way down until you land in a net of soft fabric, surrounded on all sides. Looking up you see Vari smile as she eyes her catch, safely deposited into her shirt pocket. "IT CAN BE DANGEROUS FOR A LITTLE TINY MAN LIKE YOURSELF IN THIS BIG WORLD. YOU'LL BE SAFE IN THERE FOR THE TRIP." You scream up at her asking "Where the hell are you taking me?" She covers her mouth to muffle her laughter and says "YOUR SQUEAKS ARE SO PRECIOUS... I ALREADY TOLD YOU. I'M GOING TO TAKE YOU TO MY HOME. AND ONCE WE GET THERE, I'M GOING TO..."
12511.title: Picks you up to put in her pocket!

choices: You are trapped in the pocket until Vari gets home!
You and Teanna are able to climb out!
She is stopped by a professor!
125111.content: "I'm not going to be anybody's pet, you crazy bitch!" The girl puckers up her lips and whispers "SUCH LANGUAGE. YOU WILL LEARN MANY LESSONS ABOUT RESPECT AS MY PET. BUT I WILL TEACH YOU THE FIRST ONE RIGHT NOW: WHAT I SAY GOES, AND IF YOU TALK BACK TO ME, I WILL CRUSH YOU BETWEEN MY FINGERS." You realize that she isn't playing around and shut up, sinking deeper and deeper into the pocket. You are jostled back and forth as Vari gives you a firm pat in the prison of fabric and says "THAT'S A GOOD LITTLE BOY. LEARNING YOUR PLACE ALREADY. IN FACT, I THINK YOU DESERVE SOME COMPANY..." She stomps around the office, looking for Teanna, who was shrunk in the same manner as you. "COME OUT, COME OUT, LITTLE GIRL! I WON'T BITE!" You feel the world drop as Vari gets to her knees and reaches down for the little shrunken receptionist. "YOU KNOW, YOU MAY BE EVEN CUTER THAN MY LAST PET! LET'S GET YOU HOME SO WE CAN START HAVING SOME FUN TOGETHER." Tiny, high pitched screams get closer and closer as you see two massive fingers deposit the shrunken black girl in with you, her shrunken body landing right on top of yours. She crawls to her feet and looks up in horror as she says "So Tiny... We're so tiny right now! She's so big!" You hug Teanna in a comforting embrace and say "We're going to be alright. We just need to find a way out of here." You figure that once she starts walking, there's a chance the two of you will be able to climb out and get some help. It will be dangerous at this size, but anything can be better than being a toy to this crazy Indian girl.
125111.title: Vari's Two New Pets

choices: She grows you a few more inches
She shrinks someone in her house!
She shrinks herself (just a little bit)
125112.content: You are plunged into relative darkness as Vari closes the pocket you are in, leaving you trapped against a thin layer of body heated cloth for the duration of the trip. You sway and move with Vari's every step, which makes you a bit nauseous. All you could think of during your trip was your friend Teanna. She was lost, shrunken just like you, only nobody knew she was there. You hoped she could stay safe and not get stepped on or captured. You replay the horrible things that could happen to a lost person at your side for the entire 20 minute walk that Vari takes to her home. Light floods into the pocket and you are greeted by two humongous fingers which effortlessly fish you out. You are left dangling in front of Vari's admittedly pretty but still wickedly smirking face. "WELCOME HOME, LITTLE ONE." She lowers your body over her bed and drops you forcefully onto the soft comforter. She leans her elbow on the top sheet while she gets on her knees to look at you, her eyes darting over your tiny body as if to study you quickly. "IT'S BEEN AGES SINCE I'VE GOTTEN A TOY FOR MYSELF, AND I CAN ALREADY TELL YOU WILL LAST ME QUITE A WHILE." Her huge dark skinned finger comes down to touch your tiny body, almost like a child would with a small animal. Vari's face beams with pride as she looks down on you at her bed, while all you can do is wonder how the hell you can get away from this crazy Indian girl. Her finger is soft enough not to cause any harm as she delicately brushes herself against you, but it's still incredibly uncomfortable being treated this way as a grown man. Vari's voice gets just a touch deeper as she says "HERE'S HOW THIS WILL WORK. I WILL PLAY WITH YOU FROM TIME TO TIME, AND IF YOU ARE GOOD AND DON'T MAKE A FUSS, YOU WILL BE REWARDED. IF YOU ARE NASTY TO ME OR TRY TO ESCAPE, I WILL PUNISH YOU. THERE ARE LOTS OF WAYS I COULD DO IT TO. YOU ARE VERY FRAGILE IN THIS STATE." You look up in fear to see Vari's face change from a look of determined rule-enforcing to playful giggling. She is truly terrifying from where you're standing and you are not looking forward to your first "play" session together. "BUT I WON'T KILL YOU. WHAT WOULD BE THE FUN IN THAT? YOU ARE GOING TO MAKE A WONDERFUL DOLL FOR ME, AND I WANT TO GET ALL THE FUN OUT OF YOU THAT I POSSIBLY CAN." She stops stroking you for a second and reaches into her bag, withdrawing the size ray. You get scared watching the sense of power shine in her eyes as she holds the device in her hands and adjusts the settings. She grips the trigger and holds the gun up in a readying sense and whispers down to you "BUT FIRST I NEED TO MAKE AN ADJUSTMENT OR TWO..."
125112.title: "PLAY WITH YOU... AND THIS GUN!"

choices: She points the gun at herself, quickly growing herself into a giant
She points the gun at the door, ready to shrink whoever's coming in
She shrinks herself down to tiny size and hides in the dollhouse with you!
1251123.content: You get nervous as she waves the device around, taking for granted the power she has in her hands. You don't want the gun to accidentally go off and shrink you again. Or better yet, you actually don't want her to shrink herself. If the gun doesn't shrink with her, who knows how you'd get back to normal! She tightens her grip on the gun and looks at you with a very playful grin, saying "IF I'M GOING TO PLAY WITH DOLLS AGAIN, I SHOULD PROBABLY GO BACK TO BEING A CHILD. JUST FOR A WHILE." The gun goes off in her hands and she starts to shrink. It's not as fast as when you were shrunk to begin with, and hers seems to stop at a little below four feet tall. She lets out a squeal of excitement as she spins around, taking in the sight of her newly enlarged room. "YAY! I'M SO SHORT NOW! JUST THE RIGHT SIZE TO PLAY WITH MY NEW TOY!" She places the gun down on the bed next to you, and to your shock, the gun has shrunk just a little bit. If she's holding it while she shrinks herself, it must change size with her! This is both a curse and a blessing. There's a chance she could get careless and shrink the gun down to a more manageable size for you. But on the bad side, even if she were to make herself tiny, she'd have control over the ray. She could always have something to fight back with. You don't worry about that for now as you see Vari reach under her bed. She laughs as she says "I HAVEN'T PLAYED WITH THIS IN THE LONGEST TIME. I EVEN CONSIDERED GIVING IT TO MY SISTER. I'M GLAD I HUNG ON TO IT." She rises back and drops next to you on the bed a humongous pink dollhouse. You realize just how serious she's taking her playtime with you, and start to back away. You don't get far as her large mocha colored hand appears behind you to bring you over to the house. Even though she's shrunk herself down two feet or so, she's still an imposing goddess to you. The warmth from her hand is surprisingly comforting, even knowing what she has in store for you. "WELCOME HOME, LITTLE MAN. AS LONG AS YOU ARE MINE, YOU'LL LIVE HERE. AND I'LL MAKE SURE YOU GET EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN THIS LITTLE HOUSE. GO AHEAD! TAKE THE TOUR!" Her hand shoves you into the doorway, which is a little tall for you, even at this size. You feel like a child taking a walk through a gigantic replica house, like the ones they use to test bombs with. The walls shake a bit as the giantess outside begins to narrate your tour. "THIS IS THE KITCHEN, WHERE YOU'LL GET ALL YOUR MEALS. NOW OBVIOUSLY THE APPLIANCES DON'T WORK, SO I'LL JUST HAVE TO BRING YOU SCRAPS FROM MY MEALS. YOU CAN EAT THEM AT THE TABLE THERE." The "kitchen" is just a section of the dollhouse that has food and fake electronics painted onto the wall. There's a plastic table but that's pretty much it. You continue to walk through the house and get to the stairs. You make your way up to the top floor and see a bed and two plastic dressers. "THIS IS WHERE YOU'LL SLEEP. I'LL PUT IN A FEW COTTONBALLS OR SOMETHING TO MAKE IT A LITTLE MORE COMFORTABLE. AND IF YOU WANT, YOU WON'T HAVE TO SLEEP ALONE..." You don't know what she's talking about until you peer out the window of the dollhouse and see Vari holding a regular Barbie doll. You are stunned to see that the doll is almost twice your size! "THIS IS YOUR NEW ROOMMATE. SHE'S A LITTLE BIG, BUT THEN AGAIN SO AM I. AND I EXPECT YOU TREAT US BOTH WITH RESPECT. NOW GIVE HER A KISS." You stay right where you are as Vari places the gigantic doll's head right next to the window. You are not going to degrade yourself any further... that is until Vari takes two of her fingers and slightly tips over the dollhouse. Plastic furniture and flakes of dust shoot down at you as you collapse into one of the walls of the house, only to fall to the ground in pain. Vari's eye zooms in where the Barbie's head was just a second ago, and in a very serious tone the Indian girl says "I SAID... KISS." Your pride is tarnished, but you don't want to get hurt again. The oxygen levels took a nosedive, as the pathetic young woman had fallen through a few layers of the carpeted floor in the hallway of the upper floor. Balls of gray rolled around that put even Olympus Mons to shame, and monsters roamed freely in this galaxy-sized expanse. She sighed, there wasn't much else she could do but try and climb up the continental fibers to gain a better understanding of her new world. It was hard to grab onto, with each monolithic fiber splitting up in to tinier and tinier pieces still too large to warp her body around.

After a day or two of climbing, she reached up to the top layer of the flatland and promptly collapsed, having not slept for many hours. Armed with this new knowledge, and a desire to see the rest of the girls in the game grow, you continued looking for opportunities to grow them.

You wanted to make a game out of growing the players like you did with the red team's goalie. You wanted to see how big you could grow everyone before they noticed anything was wrong. To keep suspicion down, you stuck with using small bursts, spreading them around so that all the players stayed at roughly the same heights relative to each other.

You started by firing at the players farthest away from the ball, two red team defenders and a froward from the white team. All three grew a couple inches, unaware of the changes. Then you turned to the white team's goalie. She was a brunette like the red team's, and you wanted to grow her similarly to the opposing goalie. Unfortunately, you couldn't do it all in one shot like you did before, so you were going to have to make do with growing her in stages. Luckily for you, you could grow her a bit faster than the other players since the rest of the players usually weren't focused on the goalies. Giving the goalie a moderate burst, you watched her creep upwards about 6 inches before stopping. Just in time too, since the red team was beginning an attack on her goal. The red team's blonde forward that you had grown earlier broke free from her defender, dribbled a couple times, and took a shot at the goal. Diving to her side, the white team's goalie was just able to block it, sending it out of bounds for a corner kick.

The corner kick turned out to be the best thing you could've hoped for. With all the players bunched up in one area, you would easily be able to grow them all at once, and they'd be sure to grow at the same rate, too. The girl taking the corner kick ran off to go get the ball, leaving the other 10 players an easy target for you. While everyone was struggling to gain the ideal position, you started firing into the crowd. Surely enough, you could see the whole group of girls swelling up simultaneously. They were growing slower than when you had been shooting at them individually, but they were growing consistently, and in what felt like no time at all, they had passed the 7 foot mark. The corner kick taker had just gotten the ball out to the corner when she realized her shoe was untied. As she bent down to retie it, you kept your finger on the trigger, pouring on the growth for everyone else. Just like with the red team's goalie at the other end, everyone's clothes were growing perfectly with them, and they were too distracted to notice that they were growing.

When the girl finally finished tying her shoe, you let go of the trigger and admired your work. The goalie on the white team was even taller than the red team's goalie, with the top of the goal only coming up to her chin. The rest of the players were all around equal with the top bar. You were impressed with what the gun could do. In a span of about 10 minutes, you had grown 11 normal-sized girls to a height of 8 feet or more each, and all their clothes had grown with them, leaving them completely unaware of the fact that they were growing so huge. You felt kind of bad for the one girl that you left at normal size, but on the other hand you did have to admit that it would be kind of funny to see her realize that everyone but her had become a giant.

In front of the goal, you watched as the goalie took a step back to get in position. Being larger than she was used to, she took too big of a step, and ended up smacking her head on the goal's crossbar. "Ow!" she said. "What just hit me?" She turned around to try to find what hit her, before she looked down and realized she was standing above the top of the goal. "Oh my god! I'm huge!" The other players stopped jostling with each other to look at the goalie. One by one, you could see each of them realize that they, too, had grown. Their reactions were mostly ones of confusion, but you saw that the blonde girl from the red team that you had grown first seemed quite happy about the new circumstances.

She's now holding your clothes up and patting through them, no doubt looking for the source of your little squeak earlier. You watch from your position on the table as she continues to look for something inside your clothes fruitlessly, almost forgetting about the vulnerability of your size. A few seconds later, Dr. Benson huffs and places your clothes on a nearby desk.

"Was it a mouse..? Or am I going crazy?" Dr. Benson wonders aloud as she starts to scan the room.

You start to panic as you watch your doctor look around the room, and you hurriedly look around the table for another place to hide, but find none. As it seems now, there's no way you're not going to be found out.

You hear a huge gasp from the doctor that confirms your guess. You sigh and stop trying to hide, and prepare to face the music. The giantess before you is covering her mouth and looking at you wide eyed. The two of you stare at each other for a moment, before she breaks the silence.

"Please, doctor! I need your help!" You cry, and try to sound afraid by your "sudden" shrinkage. The doctor's big blue eyes soften, and she seems to feel sorry for you.

Dr. Benson then walks over in front of the table you're on and kneels down before you to get a better look at you. You quickly hide the size ray behind your naked form, and she seems none the wiser.

"I'm sorry, but I lied to you earlier. I was feeling... weird before. I didn't know what to think, and then while I was waiting for you to come back, this happened!" You lie. The doctor nods slowly as she takes in your story.

"I see..." Dr. Benson says softly. She's clearly not sure how to process all of this, but she's trying at least, you have to give her points for that. All the while, you two continue to stare at each other, as you take in her pretty face, which seems even better magnified at your scale, and she tries to make sense of your impossible size. Then you decide to break the silence.

"Can you help me?" You ask her.

"I'm not sure..." Dr. Benson answers honestly. She gets up and takes a step away from you. "We'll have to bring in more professionals... and, maybe even quarantine you. We don't know if this disease is contagious or not. I mean, it shouldn't even be possible!"

You can't help but smirk at the doctor's efforts to try and rationalize how this happened to you. You're amazed you got her this far down your lie, but you figure most people would believe it, coming from a 1 inch tall man. You frown though at another thought. You don't want to end up in some lab being run through experiment after experiment, not that you really would, with the size ray in hand, but you'll have to think of some way to keep this between you and your beautiful doctor.

An idea pops in your head as you think, Dr. Benson is worried the "disease" might be contagious, so you think, why not make it 'contagious'!

info.brief_description: Shrink or grow yourself or others in lots of different scenarios!  Anything goes!
info.description:
You are a regular 20 year old college student relaxing in your apartment, when you're suddenly given a gun that has the power to shrink or grow anything you point it at! Works especially well on people, though!

This story will be able to encorporate all situations involving the shrinking / giantess fantasy, with almost no restriction. The story will be focused mostly on giantess and shrunken men, but there can be a chapter or two with shrinking women or giant men. The main idea behind this is to allow you to explore shrinking and growing in any situation you can think of. An office building, a gym, a school, wherever you can imagine! My only conditions are that all the characters be 18 or older, NO FAMILY MEMBER INTERACTION, and there won't be toilet stuff, or anything like that. Other than that, have fun with the options and feel free to add as much as you want!
